T02vimkn_u:3: Vkn .1.2 sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niḥkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ

T02vimkn_u:53: Vkn .1.5 daśabhiś ca brahmasahasrair jaṭibrahmapramukhaiḥ, anekāc caturmahādvīpakāl lokadhātor abhyāgatair bhagavato darśanāyai vandanāyai paryupāsanāyai dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
T02vimkn_u:58: maheśākhyamaheśākhyāḥ śakrabrahmalokapāladevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragās tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan saṃnisaṇṇāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:59: tathā catasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhiksūṇyupāsakopāsikāś copasaṃkrāntā abhūvan /

T02vimkn_u:62: sumerur iva parvatarājaḥ sāgaramadhyād abhyudgataḥ sarvaparṣadam abhibhūya bhāsate tapati virocate śrīgarbhe siṃhāsane niṣaṇnaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:63: Vkn .1.7 atha ratnākaro bodhisatvo licchavikumāraḥ sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair
T02vimkn_u:64: licchavikumāraśataiḥ saptaratnamayāni cchatrāṇi gṛhītvā vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ niṣkramya yenāmrapālīvanaṃ yena ca bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmat
T02vimkn_u:65: / upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathā parigṛhītais taiś chatrair bhagavantam abhicchādayati sma /
T02vimkn_u:67: Vkn .1.8 samantaraniḥsṛṣṭāni ca tāni ratnacchatrāṇy atha tāvad eva buddhānubhāvenaikaṃ mahāratnacchatraṃ saṃsthitam /
T02vimkn_u:68: tena ca mahāratnacchatreṇāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sarvaḥ saṃchāditaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
T02vimkn_u:70: āyāmavistāraḥ, sa tasmin mahāratnacchatre saṃdṛśyate sma /
T02vimkn_u:71: ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sumeravo mahāparvatarājā himavanmucilindamahāmucilindagandhamādanaratnaparvatā
T02vimkn_u:74: ye 'pīha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahāsamudrā vā sarastaḍāgāni vā nadīkunadyaḥ sravantyo vā pravahanti, tā api sarvās
T02vimkn_u:76: yāny apīha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sūryācandramasāṃ vimānāni tārārūpāṇi vā devabhavanāni vā nāgabhavanāni vā yakṣabhavanāni vā gandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragabhavanāni vā cāturmahārājabhavanāni vā grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānyo vā, tāny api sarvāṇi tasminn evaikamahāratnacchatre saṃdṛśyante sma /
T02vimkn_u:77: yāpi ca daśadiśi loke buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā pravartate, sāpi tasmād evaikamahāratnacchatrān
T02vimkn_u:79: Vkn .1.9 tatra sā sarvā parṣad āścaryaprāptā bhagavato 'ntikād idam evaṃrūpaṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭodagrāttamanāḥ pramuditā
T02vimkn_u:81: Vkn .1.10 atha khalu ratnākaro licchavikumāro bhagavato 'ntikād idam evaṃrūpaṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvaikāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhir abhyaṣṭāvīt:
T02vimkn_u:85: amṛtaṃgamā ca varadharmakathā udārā sā sarva śrūyati ito gaganatalātaḥ //
T02vimkn_u:86: dharmeṇa te jitam idaṃ varadharmarājyaṃ dharmaṃ dhanaṃ ca dadase jagato jitāre /
T02vimkn_u:87: dharmaprabhedakuśalaṃ paramārthadarśin dharmeśvaraṃ śirasi vandami dharmarājam // 3 //
T02vimkn_u:88: na ca nāma asti na ca nāsti giraṃ prabhāṣi hetuṃ pratītya imi saṃbhavi sarvadharmāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:89: naivātra ātmana ca kāraku vedako vā na ca karmu naśyati śubham aśubhaṃ ca kiṃcit // 4 //
T02vimkn_u:90: māras tvayāstu vijitas sabalo munīndraḥ prāptā śivā amṛtaśāntavarāgrabodhiḥ /
T02vimkn_u:91: yasminn avedita na cittamanaḥpracārā sarvakutīrthikagaṇāś ca na yānti gāhaṃ // 5 //
T02vimkn_u:92: cakraṃ ca te triparivarti bahuprakāraṃ prāvartitaṃ praśamanaṃ prakṛtīviśuddham /
T02vimkn_u:93: pratyakṣa devamanujādbhutadharmarājā ratnāni trīṇi upadarśita tatra kāle
T02vimkn_u:94: ye tubhya dharmaratanena vinīta samyak teṣām akalpana punaḥ satate praśāntā /
T02vimkn_u:95: vaidyottamaṃ maraṇajātijarāntakāriṃ śirasā nato 'smi guṇasāgaram aprameyam // 7 //
T02vimkn_u:96: satkārasatkṛta na vedhasi merukalpa duḥśīlaśīlavati tulyagatādhimaitrī /
T02vimkn_u:97: gaganaprakāśamanase samatāvihārī ko nāma satvaratane 'smi na kuryu pūjām
T02vimkn_u:98: samāgatā te janatā mahāmune mukham udīkṣanti prasannamānasā /
T02vimkn_u:99: sarve ca paśyanti jinaṃ purastāj jinasya āveṇikabuddhalakṣaṇam // 9 //
T02vimkn_u:100: ekāṃ ca vācaṃ bhagavān pramuñcase nānārutaṃ ca pariṣad vijānati /
T02vimkn_u:101: yathāsvakaṃ cārtha vijānate jano jinasya āveṇikabuddhalakṣaṇam // 10 //
T02vimkn_u:102: ekāya vācāya udīritāya vāsesi eke apare nividyasi /
T02vimkn_u:103: ākāṅkṣatāṃ kāṅkṣa śamesir nāyako jinasya āveṇikabuddhalakṣaṇam // 11 //
T02vimkn_u:104: vandāmi tvāṃ daśabala satyavikramaṃ vandāmi tvām abhayagataṃ viśāradam /
T02vimkn_u:105: dharmeṣu āveṇikaniścayaṃ gataṃ vandāmi tvāṃ sarvajagatpraṇāyakam // 12 //
T02vimkn_u:106: vandāmi samyojanabandhanacchidaṃ vandāmi tvāṃ pāragataṃ sthale sthitam /
T02vimkn_u:107: vandāmi khinnasya janasya tārakaṃ vandāmi saṃsāragatāv aniśritam // 13 //
T02vimkn_u:108: satvair samādhānagataṃ gatīgatam gatīṣu sarvāsu vimuktamānasam /
T02vimkn_u:109: jaleruhaṃ vā salile na lipyase niṣevitā te munipadma śūnyatā // 14 //
T02vimkn_u:110: vibhāvitā sarvanimitta sarvaśo na te kahiṃcit praṇidhāna vidyate /
T02vimkn_u:112: Vkn .1.11 atha ratnākaro licchavikumāro bhagavantam ābhir gāthābhir
T02vimkn_u:113: abhiṣṭutya bhagavantam etad avocat: imāni bhagavan pañcamātrāṇi
T02vimkn_u:115: tāni cemāni buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiṃ paripṛcchanti ḥ katamā bodhisatvānāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhir iti /
T02vimkn_u:118: evam ukte bhagavān ratnākarāya licchavikumārāya sādhukāram adāt: sādhu sādhu kumāra /
T02vimkn_u:119: sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ kumāra yas tvaṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhim ārabhya tathāgataṃ paripṛcchasi
T02vimkn_u:120: tena hi kumāra śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
T02vimkn_u:123: sādhu bhagavann iti ratnākaro licchavikumāras tāni ca pañcamātrāṇi licchavikumāraśatāni bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣuḥ /
T02vimkn_u:127: yāvantaṃ bodhisatvaḥ satveṣūpacayaṃ karoti tāvad buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti /
T02vimkn_u:128: yādṛśaḥ satvānāṃ vinayo bhavati tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhnāti /
T02vimkn_u:129: yādṛśena buddhakṣetrāvatāreṇa satvā buddhajñānam avataranti tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhnāti
T02vimkn_u:130: yādṛśena buddhakṣetrāvatāreṇa satvānām āryākārāṇīndriyāṇy utpadyante tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti /
T02vimkn_u:133: tadyathā ratnākara yādṛśam icched ākāśaṃ māpayituṃ tādṛśaṃ māpayeta, na cākāśaṃ śakyate māpayituṃ nāpy alaṃkartum /
T02vimkn_u:134: evam eva ratnākara ākāśasamān sarvadharmāñ jñātvā /
T02vimkn_u:135: yādṛśam icched bodhisatvaḥ satvaparipākāya buddhakṣetraṃ māpayituṃ tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ māpayati, na ca buddhakṣetrākāśatā śakyaṃ māpayituṃ nāpy alaṃkartum /
T02vimkn_u:137: āśayakṣetraṃ bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasyāśaṭhā amāyāvinaḥ satvā buddhakṣetra upapadyante /
T02vimkn_u:138: adhyāśayakṣetraṃ kulaputra bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvakuśalasaṃbhāropacitāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
T02vimkn_u:139: prayogakṣetraṃ bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvakuśaladharmopasthitāḥ satvās tatra buddhakṣetra upapadyante /
T02vimkn_u:140: udāro bodhisatvasya bodhicittotpādo buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ satvās tatra buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
T02vimkn_u:141: dānakṣetraṃ bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvaparityāginaḥ satvās tatra buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
T02vimkn_u:142: śīlakṣetraṃ bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvābhiprāyasaṃpannā daśakuśalakarmapathasaṃrakṣakāḥ satvās tatra buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
T02vimkn_u:143: kṣāntikṣetraṃ kulaputra bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasya dvātriṃśallakṣanālaṃkṛtāḥ kṣāntidamaśamathapāramiprāptāḥ satvā
T02vimkn_u:145: vīryakṣetraṃ bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvakuśalaparyeṣṭiṣv ārabdhavīryāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
T02vimkn_u:146: dhyānakṣetraṃ bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasya smṛtisaṃprajanyasamāhitāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
T02vimkn_u:147: prajñākṣetraṃ bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasya samyaktvaniyatāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
T02vimkn_u:148: catvāry apramāṇāni ca bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasya maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāvihārinaḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
T02vimkn_u:149: catvāri saṃgrahavastūni kulaputra bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvavimuktisaṃgṛhītāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
T02vimkn_u:150: upāyakauśalyaṃ bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvopāyamīmāṃsākuśalāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
T02vimkn_u:151: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasya samyaksmṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgavidhijñāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
T02vimkn_u:152: pariṇāmanācittaṃ bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvaguṇālaṃkāraṃ buddhakṣetraṃ dṛśyate /
T02vimkn_u:153: aṣṭākṣaṇapraśamadeśanā kulaputra bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvāpāyasamucchinnam aṣṭākṣaṇavigataṃ buddhakṣetraṃ saṃbhavanti /
T02vimkn_u:154: svayaṃ śikṣāpadeṣu vartamānā parāpattyacodanatā bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram, tasya bodhiprāptasyāpattiśabdo 'pi buddhakṣetre na saṃbhavati /
T02vimkn_u:156: tasya bodhiprāptasya niyatāyuṣo mahābhogā brahmacāriṇaḥ satyānuparivartinyā vācālaṃkṛtā madhuravacanā abhinnaparṣado bhinnasaṃdhānakuśalā īrṣyāvigatā avyāpannacittāḥ samyagdṛṣṭisamanvāgatāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
T02vimkn_u:157: Vkn .1.14 iti hi kulaputra, yāvanto bodhisatvasya prayogās tāvanta āśayāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:169: tasmāt tarhi kulaputra buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayitukāmena bodhisatvena svacittapariśodhane yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:171: yādṛśī bodhisatvasya cittapariśuddhis tādṛśī buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ saṃbhavati /
T02vimkn_u:172: Vkn .1.15 atha buddhānubhāvenāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitad abhavat: yadi yādṛśī cittapariśuddhis tādṛśī bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ
T02vimkn_u:173: saṃbhavati, tan mā āhaiva bhagavataḥ śākyamuner bodhisatvacaryāṃ carataś cittam apariśuddhaṃ yenedaṃ buddhakṣetram evam apariśuddhaṃ saṃdṛśyate /
T02vimkn_u:174: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: tat kiṃ manyase, śāriputra mā āhaiva sūryācandramasāv apariśuddhau yaj jātyandho na paśyati /
T02vimkn_u:175: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan jātyandhāparādha eṣa na sūryacandramasoḥ /
T02vimkn_u:176: āha: evam eva śāriputra satvānām ajñānāparādha eṣa yas tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraguṇālaṃkāravyūhaṃ kecit satvā na paśyanti, na tatra tathāgatasyāparādhaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:177: pariśuddhaṃ hi śāriputra tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ yūyaṃ punar idaṃ na paśyatha /
T02vimkn_u:178: Vkn .1.16 atha khalu jaṭī brahmā sthaviraṃ śāriputram etad avocat: mā bhadantaśāriputra tathāgatasyāpariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetram idaṃ vyāhārṣīt /
T02vimkn_u:180: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra vaśavartināṃ devānāṃ bhavanavyūhāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:181: īdṛśān vayaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ paśyāmaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:182: atha khalu sthaviraḥ śāriputro jaṭinaṃ brahmāṇam etad avocat: vayaṃ punar brahmann imāṃ mahāpṛthivīm utkūlanikūlāṃ kaṇṭakaprapātagiriśekharaśvabhragūthoḍigallapratipūrṇāṃ paśyāmaḥ jaṭī brahmāha: nūnaṃ bhadantaśāriputrasyotkūlanikūlaṃ cittam
T02vimkn_u:184: ye punas te bhadantaśāriputra bodhisatvāḥ sarvasatvasamacittāḥ pariśuddhabuddhajñānāśayās ta imaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ paśyanti /
T02vimkn_u:185: Vkn .1.17 atha bhagavān pādāṅguṣṭhena imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ parāhanti sma /
T02vimkn_u:189: tadyathāpi nāma ratnavyūhasya tathāgatasyānantaguṇaratnavyūho lokadhātus tādṛśo 'yaṃ
T02vimkn_u:191: tatra sā sarvāvatī parṣad āścaryaprāptā ratnapadmaniṣaṇnam ātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma /
T02vimkn_u:192: Vkn .1.18 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma: paśyasi tvaṃ śāriputra imān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān /
T02vimkn_u:193: āha: paśyāmi bhagavan adṛṣṭāśrutapūrvā ime vyūhāḥ saṃdṛśyante /
T02vimkn_u:194: āha: īdṛśaṃ mama śāriputra sadā buddhakṣetram /
T02vimkn_u:195: hīnasatvaparipākāya tu tathāgata evaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ buddhakṣetram upadarśayati /
T02vimkn_u:196: tadyathā śāriputra devaputrāṇām ekapātryāṃ bhuñjānānāṃ yathā puṇyopacayaviśeṣeṇa sudhādevabhojanam upatiṣṭhataḥ, evam eva śāriputra ekabuddhakṣetropapannā yathā cittapariśuddhyā satvā buddhānāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyanti /
T02vimkn_u:197: Vkn .1.19 asmin khalu punar buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhālaṃkāre saṃdarśyamāne caturaśīteḥ prāṇisahasrāṇām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni
T02vimkn_u:198: / yāni ca tāni ratnākareṇa licchavikumāreṇa sārdhaṃ pañca licchavikumāraśatāny āgatāni teṣām apy ānulomikyāḥ kṣānteḥ pratilaṃbho 'bhūt /
T02vimkn_u:199: Vkn .1.20 atha bhagavān punar eva tām ṛddhiṃ pratisaṃharati sma /
T02vimkn_u:200: tataḥ punar evedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ tatsvabhāvam eva saṃvṛtam, tatra śrāvakayānikānāṃ devamanuṣyāṇām ḥ anityā bateme sarvasaṃskārā iti viditvā
T02vimkn_u:201: dvātriṃśatā prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajovigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddham /
T02vimkn_u:202: aṣṭānāṃ ca bhikṣusahasrāṇām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni /
T02vimkn_u:203: caturaśīteś ca prāṇisahasrāṇām udārabuddhadharmādhimuktānāṃ Ō viṭhapanapratyupasthānalakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmā iti viditvānuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni // //
T02vimkn_u:205: Vkn .2.1 tena khalu punaḥ samayena vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ vimalakīrtir nāma licchaviḥ prativasati sma /
T02vimkn_u:215: sarvaśakrabrahmalokapālanamaskṛtaḥ, sa satvaparipākāyopāyakauśalyena vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ prativasati sma /
T02vimkn_u:224: bhāryāputradārāṃś ca saṃdarśayati, sadā ca brahmacārī /
T02vimkn_u:225: parivāraparivṛtaś ca bhavati, sadā ca vivekacārī /
T02vimkn_u:226: ābharaṇavibhūṣitaś ca saṃdṛśyate, sadā ca lakṣaṇaparicchinnaḥ
T02vimkn_u:228: sarvadyūtakaraśālāsu ca saṃdṛśyate, dyūtakrīḍāsaktacittāṃś ca satvān
T02vimkn_u:235: Vkn .2.4 dharmavādī ca vṛddhamadhyadahrasahāyakaś ca lokānuvartanāya /
T02vimkn_u:239: sarvadharmaśravaṇasāṃkathyeṣu ca saṃdṛśyate hīnayānavicchandanāya mahāyāne samādāpanatayā
T02vimkn_u:254: iti hi vimalakīrtir licchavir evam apramāṇopāyakauśalajñānasamanvāgato vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ prativasati sma /
T02vimkn_u:255: Vkn .2.7 sa upāyakauśalyena glānam ātmānam upadarśayati sma /
T02vimkn_u:256: tasya glānasya vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ rājarājamahāmātrāmātyakumārapāriṣadyā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ śreṣṭhinaigamajānapadās tadanyāni ca bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi glānaparipṛcchakāny upasaṃkrāmanti sma /
T02vimkn_u:258: imam eva cāturmahābhautikaṃ kāyam ārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati sma: evam anityo 'yaṃ
T02vimkn_u:260: evam adhruvaḥ, evam anāsvāsikaḥ, evaṃ durbalaḥ, evam asāraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:261: evaṃ jarjaraḥ, evam itvaraḥ, evaṃ duḥkhaḥ, evam ābādhikaḥ, evaṃ
T02vimkn_u:291: tatra yuṣmābhir evaṃrūpe kāye nirvidvirāga utpādayitavyas tathāgatakāye ca spṛhotpādayitavyā
T02vimkn_u:292: Vkn .2.12 dharmakāyo hi mārṣāḥ tathāgatakāyo dānanirjātaḥ śīlanirjātaḥ
T02vimkn_u:298: abhijñāvidyānirjātaḥ sarvākuśaladharmaprahāṇāya nirjātaḥ sarvakuśaladharmaparigrahanirjātaḥ satyanirjāto bhūtanirjāto
T02vimkn_u:300: apramāṇaśubhakarmanirjāto mārṣās tathāgatakāyas tatra yuṣmābhiḥ spṛhā kartavyā /
T02vimkn_u:301: sarvasatvānāṃ ca sarvakleśavyādhiprahāṇāyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayitavyāni
T02vimkn_u:302: Vkn .2.13 evaṃ vimalakīrtir licchavis tathā saṃnipatitānāṃ teṣāṃ
T02vimkn_u:303: glānaparipṛcchakānāṃ tathā tathā dharmaṃ deśayati yad bahūni satvaśatasahasrāṇy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayanti // //
T02vimkn_u:305: Vkn .3.1 atha vimalakīrter licchaver etad abhavat: ahaṃ ca glāna ābādhiko
T02vimkn_u:306: mañcasamārūḍhaḥ, na ca māṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ samanvāharati,
T02vimkn_u:307: na ca me glānaparipṛcchakaṃ kaṃcit preṣayaty anukaṃpām upādāya /
T02vimkn_u:308: Vkn .3.2 samanvāhṛtaś ca bhagavatā vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ /
T02vimkn_u:309: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma: gaccha tvaṃ śāriputra vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:310: evam ukta āyuṣmāñ śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe
T02vimkn_u:313: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan: ekasmin samaye 'nyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle pratisaṃlīno 'bhūvam /
T02vimkn_u:314: vimalakīrtiś ca licchavir yena tad vṛkṣamūlaṃ tenopasaṃkramya mām etad
T02vimkn_u:316: Vkn .3.3 na bhadantaśāriputra evaṃ pratisaṃlayanaṃ saṃlātavyaṃ yathā tvaṃ pratisaṃlīnaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:317: api tu tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā traidhātuke na kāyaś cittaṃ vā saṃdṛśyate /
T02vimkn_u:318: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā nirodhāc ca na vyuttiṣṭhasi sarveryāpatheṣu ca saṃdṛśyase /
T02vimkn_u:319: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā prāptilakṣaṇaṃ ca na vijahāsi pṛthagjanalakṣaṇeṣu ca saṃdṛśyase
T02vimkn_u:320: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā te na cādhyātmaṃ cittam avasthitaṃ bhaven na bahirdhopavicaret
T02vimkn_u:321: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā sarvadṛṣṭigatebhyaś ca na calasi saptatriṃśatsu ca bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃdṛśyase /
T02vimkn_u:322: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā saṃsārāvacarāṃś ca kleśān na prajahāsi nirvāṇasamavasaraṇaś ca bhavasi /
T02vimkn_u:323: ye bhadantaśāriputra evaṃ pratisaṃlayanaṃ pratisaṃlīyante teṣāṃ bhagavān pratisaṃlayanam anujānāti
T02vimkn_u:324: Vkn .3.4 so 'haṃ bhagavan etāṃ śrutvā tūṣṇīm evābhūvam /
T02vimkn_u:325: na tasya śaknomy uttare prativacanaṃ dātum /
T02vimkn_u:326: tan nāham utsahe tasya kulaputrasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:327: Vkn .3.5 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayate sma:
T02vimkn_u:328: gaccha tvaṃ maudgalyāyana vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:329: maudgalyāyano 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum
T02vimkn_u:332: ekasmin samaye vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryām anyatamasmin vīthīmukhe gṛhapatibhyo dharmaṃ deśayāmi
T02vimkn_u:333: tatra māṃ vimalakīrtir licchavir upasaṃkrāmyaivam āha:
T02vimkn_u:334: Vkn .3.6 na bhadantamaudgalyāyana gṛhibhyo 'vadātavasanebhya evaṃ dharmo deśayitavyo yathā bhadanto deśayati /
T02vimkn_u:335: api tu tathā bhadantamaudgalyāyana dharmo deśayitavyo yathaiva sa dharmaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:336: dharmo hi bhadantamaudgalyāyana asatvaḥ satvarajovigataḥ, nairātmyo rāgarajovigataḥ, nirjīvo
T02vimkn_u:344: bhūtakoṭipratiṣṭhito 'tyantācalitatvāt, acalitaḥ ṣaḍviṣayāniśritatvāt, na kvacid gamanāgamano 'navasthitatvāt, śūnyatāsamāhita ānimittaprabhāvito 'praṇihitalakṣaṇaḥ, ūhāpohavigataḥ, anutkṣepo 'prakṣepaḥ,
T02vimkn_u:348: Vkn .3.7 īdṛśasya bhadantamahāmaudgalyāyana dharmasya kīdṛśī deśanā /
T02vimkn_u:352: yatra bhadantamaudgalyāyana asamāropapadaṃ na tatra deśyate na śrūyate na vijñāyate /
T02vimkn_u:354: Vkn .3.8 evaṃ hi cittāvasthānena dharmo deśayitavyaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:355: satvendriyakuśalena ca te bhavitavyam, sudṛṣṭaprajñādarśanena mahākaruṇāmukhībhūtena mahāyānasaṃvarṇakena buddhekṛtajñena śuddhāśayena dharmaniruktividhijñena,
T02vimkn_u:357: Vkn .3.9 tena bhagavan tathā tathā dharmo deśito yathā tato gṛhapatiparsado 'ṣṭānāṃ gṛhapatiśatānām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T02vimkn_u:360: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:361: Vkn .3.10 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapam āmantrayate sma: gaccha tvaṃ mahākāśyapa vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:362: mahākāśyapo 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum
T02vimkn_u:364: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan daridravīthyāṃ piṇḍāya carāmi /
T02vimkn_u:365: tatra māṃ vimalakirtir licchavir upasaṃkramyaivam āha:
T02vimkn_u:366: Vkn .3.11 prādeśikī bhadantamahākāśyapasya karuṇāmaitrī, yan mahākulāny utsṛjya daridrakulāny upasaṃkrāmasi /
T02vimkn_u:367: api tu bhadantamahākāśyapa dharmasamatāpratiṣṭhitena te bhavitavyam /
T02vimkn_u:383: Vkn .3.13 yadi sthaviro mahākāśyapo 'ṣṭau ca mithyātvāni samatikrāmet,
T02vimkn_u:384: aṣṭau ca vimokṣān samāpadyeta, mithyāsamatayā ca samyaktvasamatām
T02vimkn_u:385: avataret, ekena ca piṇḍapātena sarvasatvān pratipādayet, sarvabuddhān sarvāryāṃś ca pratipādya paścād ātmanā paribhuñjīta, tathā ca paribhuñjīta
T02vimkn_u:386: yathā na saṃkleśo na vigatakleśaḥ, paribhuñjīta na samāhito na vyutthitaḥ,
T02vimkn_u:388: ye ca bhadantāya piṇḍapātaṃ dadati te teṣāṃ nālpaphalaṃ na mahāphalaiḥ bhavet /
T02vimkn_u:389: na ca hānāya na viśeṣāya gacchet, buddhagatisamavasaraṇāya ca bhaveta na śrāvakagatisamavasaraṇāya
T02vimkn_u:391: Vkn .3.14 so 'haṃ bhagavan imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvāścaryaprāptaḥ sarvabodhisatvān namasyāmi
T02vimkn_u:394: tataḥ prabhṛti me na kaścit satvaḥ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā samādāpitapūrvo 'nyatra
T02vimkn_u:396: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya kulaputrasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:397: Vkn .3.15 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayate sma: gaccha tvaṃ subhūte vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:398: subhūtir apy āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:401: ekasmin samaye vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ piṇḍāya carāmi /
T02vimkn_u:403: tasya me vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ pātraṃ gṛhītvā praṇītena bhojanena pratipūryaivam āha:
T02vimkn_u:404: Vkn .3.16 sacet tvaṃ bhadantasubhūte āmiṣasamatayā sarvadharmasamatām anugataḥ sarvadharmasamatayā ca buddhadharmasamatām anugata eva, tvam imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pratigṛhnīṣva /
T02vimkn_u:405: sacet tvaṃ bhadantasubhūte na rāgadoṣamohaprahīṇo na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvasasi /
T02vimkn_u:406: saced evam asy avikopya satkāyam ekāyanaṃ mārgam anugataḥ /
T02vimkn_u:407: na ca te 'vidyā bhavatṛṣṇā ca samudghātitā na ca vidyāvimuktī utpādite /
T02vimkn_u:410: na ca te catvāry āryasatyāni dṛṣṭāni na ca na dṛṣṭasatyaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:414: Vkn .3.17 na ca te śāstā dṛṣṭo na dharmaḥ śruto na saṃghaḥ paryupāsitaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:415: ye ca te ṣaṭ śāstāras tadyathā pūraṇaḥ kāśyapaḥ, maskarī gośālīputraḥ,
T02vimkn_u:416: saṃjayo vairāṣṭrikaputraḥ, kakudaḥ kātyāyanaḥ, ajitaḥ keśakambalaḥ,
T02vimkn_u:417: nirgrantho jñātiputraḥ, te ca bhadantasya śāstāras tāṃś ca niśritya pravrajito yadgāminas te ṣaṭ śāstāras tadgāmy evāryasubhūtiḥ,
T02vimkn_u:418: Vkn .3.18 sarvadṛṣṭigateṣu cāryaman antargato na cāntamadhyaprāptaḥ,
T02vimkn_u:419: aṣṭākṣaṇasamavasaraṇaś cāsi na cāsi lakṣaṇam anuprāptaḥ, saṃkleśena cāsi samo 'vyavadānam adhigataḥ, yā ca sarvasatvānām araṇā sā bhadantasyāpy
T02vimkn_u:420: araṇā, na ca tvayā dakṣiṇā viśodhyate, ye ca bhadantāya piṇḍapātaṃ dadati tāṃś ca vinipātayasi, sarvamāraiś ca te sārdham ekahastaḥ kṛtaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:421: sarvakleśāś ca te sahāyāḥ, yatsvabhāvāś ca kleśās tatsvabhāvo bhadantaḥ,
T02vimkn_u:422: sarvasatveṣu te vadhakacittaṃ pratyupasthitam, sarvabuddhāś ca te
T02vimkn_u:423: 'bhyākhyātāḥ, sarvabuddhadharmāṃś ca pratikrośasi, na cāsi saṃghapratisaraṇaḥ, na ca jātu parinirvāsyasi /
T02vimkn_u:425: Vkn .3.19 tasya me bhagavan imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvāndhakāraprāptā diśo
T02vimkn_u:426: 'bhūvan ḥ tat kim asmai nirdiśāmi, katham vā pratipadya iti /
T02vimkn_u:427: so 'haṃ tat pātram utsṛjya tato gṛhān niṣkramiṣyāmīti /
T02vimkn_u:428: vimalakīrtir Iicchavir mām evam āha: mā bhadantasubhūte akṣarebhya
T02vimkn_u:430: tat kiṃ manyase bhadantasubhūte, yadi tathāgatanirmita evam ucyeta kaccit sa uttraset /
T02vimkn_u:432: sa mām evam āha: nirmitamāyāsvabhāvebhyo bhadantasubhūte sarvadharmebhyo
T02vimkn_u:436: tatsvabhāvāni, evaṃ paṇḍitā akṣareṣu na sajjanti na tebhya uttrasyanti /
T02vimkn_u:438: sarvāṇi tāny akṣarāṇy anakṣarāṇi sthāpayitvā vimuktiṃ vimuktilakṣaṇāṃś ca sarvadharmān /
T02vimkn_u:439: Vkn .3.20 iha nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne dvayor devaputraśatayor virajo
T02vimkn_u:440: vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddham, pañcānāṃ ca devaputraśatānām
T02vimkn_u:442: ahaṃ ca niṣpratibhāno 'bhūvam, na cāsya śaknomy uttare prativacanaṃ dātum /
T02vimkn_u:443: tan nāham utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:444: Vkn .3.21 atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputram
T02vimkn_u:445: āmantrayate sma: gaccha tvaṃ pūrṇa vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:446: pūrṇo 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako
T02vimkn_u:449: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan: ekasmin samaye vanasyānyatamasmin pṛthivīpradeśa ādikarmikāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi
T02vimkn_u:450: tatra vimalakīrtir licchavir upasaṃkramya mām evam āha:
T02vimkn_u:451: Vkn .3.22 samāpadya bhadantapūrṇa eteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ cittaṃ vyavalokya
T02vimkn_u:454: jāniṣva tāvat kimāśayā ete bhikṣava iti /
T02vimkn_u:456: mā bhadantapūrṇa apratyavekṣyā satvendriyeṣu prādeśikendriyatvam upasaṃhārṣīḥ /
T02vimkn_u:462: api bhadantapūrṇa sarve hy ete bhikṣavo mahāyānasaṃprasthitā amuṣitabodhicittāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:465: jātyandhā iva me śrāvakāḥ pratibhānti satvendriyavimātratājñāne /
T02vimkn_u:466: Vkn .3.23 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma /
T02vimkn_u:467: yathā te bhikṣavo 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsam anusmaraṇti sma /
T02vimkn_u:468: te pañcabuddhaśataparyupāsitakuśalamūlāḥ samyaksaṃbodhaye, teṣāṃ tad bodhicittam āmukhībhūtam
T02vimkn_u:469: te tasya satpuruṣasya pādau śirobhiḥ praṇamya tatraiva niṣaṇṇāḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā, teṣāṃ tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yathāvaivartikāḥ saṃvṛttā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T02vimkn_u:470: Vkn .3.24 tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:471: Vkn .3.25 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ kātyāyanam āmantrayate sma: gaccha tvaṃ kātyāyana vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:472: kātyāyano 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:476: teṣāṃ sūtrapadaviniścayāya dharmaṃ deśayāmi, yad idam anityārthaṃ duḥkhārtham anātmārthaṃ śāntārtham /
T02vimkn_u:477: tatra vimalakīrtir licchavir upasaṃkramya mām evam āha:
T02vimkn_u:478: Vkn .3.26 mā bhadantakātyāyana sapracārām utpādabhaṅgayuktāṃ dharmatāṃ nirdiśa /
T02vimkn_u:479: yo bhadantamahākātyāyana atyantatayā na jāto na janiṣyati notpanno na niruddho na nirotsyate 'yam anityārthaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:483: anujjvalitam, yad anujvalitaṃ na tac chāmyati, yo 'tyantopaśamo 'yaṃ
T02vimkn_u:485: Vkn .3.27 asmin khalu punar nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni /
T02vimkn_u:486: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:487: Vkn .3.28 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam aniruddham āmantrayate sma: gaccha tvam aniruddha vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:488: aniruddho 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:490: Vkn .3.29 abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan: anyatamasmiṃś caṅkrame caṅkramāmi /
T02vimkn_u:491: tatra śubhavyūho nāma brahmā daśabhir brahmasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ pradeśam avabhāsya yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya mama pādau śirasābhivandyaikānte sthitvā mām etad avocat: kiyad āyuṣmān aniruddho divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati /
T02vimkn_u:492: tam enam aham etad avocam: ahaṃ mārṣa imaṃ triṃ sāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ bhagavataḥ śākyamuner buddhakṣetraṃ tad yathāpi nāma karatale nyastam āmalakaphalam evaṃ paśyāmi /
T02vimkn_u:493: Vkn .3.30 iyaṃ ca kathā pravṛttā vimalakīrtiś ca licchavis taṃ pradeśam
T02vimkn_u:495: upasaṃkramya mama pādau śirasā vanditvaivam āha: kiṃ bhadantāniruddha divyaṃ cakṣur abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇam utānabhisaṃskāralakṣaṇam /
T02vimkn_u:496: yady abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇaṃ tad bāhyaiḥ pañcābhijñaiḥ samam, athānabhisaṃskāralakṣaṇaṃ anabhisaṃskāro
T02vimkn_u:500: Vkn .3.31 sa ca brahmā tasya satpuruṣasyemaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvāścaryaprāptas taṃ namaskṛtyaitad avocat: ke loke divyacakṣuṣaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:501: āha: buddhā bhagavanto loke divyacakṣuṣo ye samāhitāvasthāṃ ca na vijahati
T02vimkn_u:504: Vkn .3.32 atha sa brahmemaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā daśasahasraparivāro
T02vimkn_u:506: sa māṃ vanditvā taṃ ca satpuruṣam abhivādya tatraivāntarhitaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:508: tan nāham utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:509: Vkn .3.33 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam upālim āmantrayate sma: gaccha tvam upāle vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:510: upālir apy āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako
T02vimkn_u:513: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan: anyatamau dvau bhikṣū āpattim āpannau, tau bhagavataḥ paryapatrapamāṇau bhagavantaṃ nopasaṃkrāmataḥ /
T02vimkn_u:514: tau yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntāv upasaṃkrāmya mām etad avocatām /
T02vimkn_u:515: āvāṃ bhadantopāle āpattim āpannau, tāv āvāṃ paryapatrapamāṇau
T02vimkn_u:517: utsāhāya āyuṣmann upāle vinodayasvāvayoḥ kaukṛtyaṃ vyutthāpayasvāvām āpatteḥ /
T02vimkn_u:518: Vkn .3.34 so 'haṃ bhagavaṃs tau bhikṣū dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayāmi /
T02vimkn_u:519: vimalakīrtiś ca licchavis taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ sa mām etad avocat: mā bhadantopāle etau bhikṣū āgāḍhīkārṣīḥ, vinodayānayor āpattim, mā āvilīkārṣīḥ /
T02vimkn_u:520: na hi bhadantopāle āpattir adhyātmapratiṣṭhitā na bahirdhāsaṃkrānto nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate
T02vimkn_u:522: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā cittasaṃkleśāt satvāḥ saṃkliśyante cittavyavadānād viśudhyante /
T02vimkn_u:523: cittaṃ ca bhadantopāle nādhyātmapratiṣṭhitaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate /
T02vimkn_u:524: yathā cittaṃ tathāpattiḥ, yathāpattis tathā sarvadharmāḥ, tathatāṃ na vyativartante /
T02vimkn_u:525: yā bhadantopāle cittasya prakṛtir yayā cittaprakṛtyā bhadantasya cittaṃ vimuktam, kiṃ jātu
T02vimkn_u:538: ye tv evaṃ jānanti te vinayadharā ity ucyante /
T02vimkn_u:540: Vkn .3.36 atha tau bhikṣu etad avocatām: prajñādharo vinayadharo 'yam
T02vimkn_u:542: na tv ayaṃ bhadantopālir yo bhagavatā vinayadharāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:543: tāv aham evaṃ vadāmi: mā bhikṣū atra gṛhapatisaṃjñām utpādayatām /
T02vimkn_u:545: tathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā nāsti kaścic chrāvako vā bodhisatvo
T02vimkn_u:548: Vkn .3.37 atha tau bhikṣū vinītakaukṛtyāv adhyāśayena tatraivānuttarāyāṃ
T02vimkn_u:549: samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditavantau, taṃ ca satpuruṣam abhivandyaivam
T02vimkn_u:550: āhatuḥ: sarvasatvā īdṛśasya pratibhānasya lābhino bhavantu /
T02vimkn_u:551: tan nāham utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:552: Vkn .3.38 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ rāhulam āmantrayate sma: gaccha tvaṃ rāhula vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:553: rāhulo 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako
T02vimkn_u:556: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan: ekasmin samaye saṃbahulā licchavikumārakā yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya mām etad avocan: tvaṃ rāhula tasya bhagavataḥ putraś cakravartirājyam utsṛjya pravrajitaḥ, tatra ke te pravrajyāyā guṇānuśaṃsāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:557: teṣām ahaṃ yathārūpaṃ pravrajyāyā guṇānuśaṃsā nirdiśāmi, vimalakīrtir licchavir yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
T02vimkn_u:559: Vkn .3.39 na bhadantarāhula evaṃ pravrajyāyā guṇānuśaṃsā nirdeṣṭavyā yathā tvaṃ nirdiśasi
T02vimkn_u:564: cāsaṃskṛtā, asaṃskṛte ca na guṇā nānuśāṃsā /
T02vimkn_u:565: pravrajyā bhadantarāhula arūpiṇi rūpavigatā, panthā nirvāṇasya, praśaṃsitā paṇḍitaiḥ,
T02vimkn_u:569: prajñaptisamatikrāntā, paṅke saṃkramaḥ, amamā mamakāravigatā, aparigrahā,
T02vimkn_u:574: Vkn .3.40 pravrajata yūyaṃ kumārakāḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye /
T02vimkn_u:575: durlabho hi buddhotpādaḥ, durlabhā kṣaṇasaṃpat, durlabho manuṣyapratilambhaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:576: te kumārakā evam āhuḥ: śrutam asmābhir gṛhapate, na tathāgato 'navasṛṣṭaṃ
T02vimkn_u:578: sa tān āha: utpādayata yūyaṃ kumārakāḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam
T02vimkn_u:579: / pratipattyā ca saṃpādayata, saiva yuṣmākaṃ bhaviṣyati pravrajyā sopasaṃpat /
T02vimkn_u:580: Vkn .3.41 tatra dvātriṃśatā licchavikumārair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni
T02vimkn_u:581: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:582: Vkn .3.42 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma: gaccha tvam ānanda vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:583: ānanda āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako
T02vimkn_u:586: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan: ekasmin samaye bhagavataḥ kāyasya kaścid evābādhaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:589: 'ham anyatamasmin brāhmaṇamahāśālasya gṛhamūle pātraṃ gṛhītvā sthitaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:592: Vkn .3.43 kiṃ bhadantānanda kālyam eva pātram ādāyāsmin gṛhadvārasamīpe tiṣṭhasi /
T02vimkn_u:593: tam enam aham etad avocam: bhagavato gṛhapate kāyasya kaścid evābādhaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:594: tatra ca kṣīreṇa kṛtyam, tat paryeṣāmi /
T02vimkn_u:595: sa mām evam āha: alaṃ bhadantānanda mā evaṃ vocaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:596: vajrasaṃhatano hi bhadantānanda tathāgatakāyaḥ sarvākuśalavāsanāprahīṇaḥ sarvamahaujaskakuśaladharmasamanvāgataḥ
T02vimkn_u:601: mā mahaujaskā devaputrā anyabuddhakṣetrasaṃnipatitāś ca bodhisatvāḥ śroṣyanti /
T02vimkn_u:602: rājñas tāvad bhadantānanda cakravartina itvarakuśalamūlasamanvāgatasya vyādhir na saṃvidyate
T02vimkn_u:608: kīdṛśo bata ayam eṣāṃ śāstā yaḥ svayam eva tāvad ātmānaṃ glānaṃ na śaknoti paritrātum, kutaḥ punar glānānāṃ satvānāṃ trāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T02vimkn_u:611: Vkn .3.45 api tu bhadantānanda dharmakāyās tathāgatā nāmiṣakāyāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:615: tasya bhadanto vyādhim icchatīty ayuktam asadṛśam /
T02vimkn_u:616: Vkn .3.46 tasya me bhagavan mahadapatrāpyaṃ jātam /
T02vimkn_u:620: evam etad ānanda yathā gṛhapatir nirdiśati /
T02vimkn_u:621: atha ca punaḥ pañcakaṣāye bhagavān utpannaḥ, tenānarthalūhadaridracaryayā satvā vinetavyāḥ
T02vimkn_u:622: tad gaccha tvam ānanda kṣīraṃ gṛhītvā, mā paryapatrapaś ceti /
T02vimkn_u:623: Vkn .3.47 īdṛśā bhagavan vimalakīrter licchaveḥ praśnavyākaraṇanirdeśāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:624: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya kulaputrasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:625: Vkn .3.48 evaṃ tāni pañcamātrāṇi śrāvakaśatāny anutsahamānāni bhagavate
T02vimkn_u:627: ye ca tair vimalakīrtinā licchavinā sārdhaṃ kathāsaṃlāpāḥ kṛtās tān sarvān bhagavate nivedayanti sma /
T02vimkn_u:628: Vkn .3.49 tatra bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisatvam āmantrayate sma: gaccha tvaṃ maitreya vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:629: maitreyo 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:632: ekasmin samaye saṃtuṣitena devaputreṇa sārdhaṃ tuṣitakāyikaiś ca devaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayāmi yad idaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānām avivartyāṃ bhūmim ārabhya /
T02vimkn_u:633: tatra ca vimalakīrtir licchavis taṃ pradeśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:635: Vkn .3.50 tvaṃ maitreya ekajātipratibaddho bhagavatā vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ
T02vimkn_u:637: tat katamayāsi maitreya jātyāu vyākṛtaḥ, kim atītayā vānāgatayota pratyutpannayā /
T02vimkn_u:638: tatra yātītā jātiḥ sā kṣīṇā, yāpy anāgatā sāpy asaṃprāptā, pratyutpannāyāḥ sthitir nāsti jāteḥ /
T02vimkn_u:640: bhagavatā: tathā hi tvaṃ bhikṣaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe jāyase jīryasi mriyase
T02vimkn_u:645: Vkn .3.51 tat kathaṃ tvaṃ maitreya vyākṛtas tathatotpādena
T02vimkn_u:647: na ca tathatotpadyate na nirudhyate, na nirotsyate /
T02vimkn_u:648: yā ca sarvasatvānāṃ tathatā, yā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatā, saiva maitreyasyāpi tathatā /
T02vimkn_u:649: evaṃ yadi tvaṃ vyākṛtaḥ sarvasatvā api vyākṛtā bhavanti /
T02vimkn_u:652: tad yadā maitreyo bodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate, sarvasatvā api tasmin samaye tādṛśīm eva bodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante /
T02vimkn_u:658: na hy aparinirvṛtānāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ tathāgatāḥ parinirvānti /
T02vimkn_u:660: tasmād iha maitreya mā etān devaputrān ullāpaya mā visaṃvādaya /
T02vimkn_u:661: Vkn .3.52 na bodhau kaścit pratiṣṭhate, na nivartate /
T02vimkn_u:662: api tu khalu punar maitreya yaiṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ bodhiparikalpanadṛṣṭis tām etām utsarjaya
T02vimkn_u:663: na hi bodhiḥ kāyenābhisaṃbudhyate, na cittena /
T02vimkn_u:664: vyupaśamo bodhiḥ sarvanimittānām, asamāropo bodhiḥ sarvārambaṇānām, apracāro bodhiḥ sarvamanaskārāṇām, paricchedo bodhiḥ sarvadṛṣṭigatānām, vigamo bodhiḥ sarvaparikalpānām, visaṃyogo bodhiḥ sarveñjitamanyasyanditānām,
T02vimkn_u:665: anadhiṣṭhānaṃ bodhiḥ sarvapraṇidhānānām, asaṅgapraveśo bodhiḥ sarvodgrahavigatā, sthitā bodhir dharmadhātusthāne, anugatā bodhis tathatāyām, pratiṣṭhitā bodhir bhūtakoṭyām, advayā bodhir manodharmavigatā
T02vimkn_u:666: / samā bodhir ākāśasamatayā, asaṃskṛtā bodhir utpādabhaṅgasthityanyathātvavigatā, parijñā bodhiḥ sarvasatvacittacaritāśayānām, advārā bodhir āyatanānām, asaṃsṛṣṭā bodhiḥ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśavigatā, na deśasthā na pradeśasthā bodhiḥ sthānāsthānavigatā, tathatāpratiṣṭhitā bodhiḥ sarvato 'dṛśyā /
T02vimkn_u:667: nāmadheyamātraṃ bodhis tac ca nāma nirīhakam, nirātmikā bodhir āyūhaniryūhavigatā, anākulā bodhiḥ prakṛtipariśuddhā, prakāśā bodhiḥ svabhāvapariśuddhā, anudgrahā bodhir adhyālambanavigatā, nirnānātvā bodhiḥ sarvadharmasamatāvabodhatvāt, anupamā bodhir upamopanyāsavigatāḥ, sūkṣmā bodhir duranubodhatvāt, sarvatrānugatā bodhir ākāśasvabhāvatvāt /
T02vimkn_u:668: sā na śakyā kāyena vācā cittenābhisaṃboddhum /
T02vimkn_u:669: Vkn .3.53 iha bhagavan nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne tataḥ pariṣado dvayor devaputraśatayor anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt /
T02vimkn_u:671: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:672: Vkn .3.54 tatra bhagavān prabhāvyūhaṃ licchavikumāram āmantrayate sma:
T02vimkn_u:673: gaccha tvaṃ satpuruṣa vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:674: prabhāvyūho 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum
T02vimkn_u:677: ekasmin samaye bhagavan vaiśālyā mahānagaryā niṣkramāmi /
T02vimkn_u:679: so 'haṃ tam abhivādyaivam avocam: kutas tvaṃ gṛhapate āgacchasīti /
T02vimkn_u:680: sa mām evam āha: āgacchāmi bodhimaṇḍād iti /
T02vimkn_u:681: tam aham etad avocam: bodhimaṇḍa iti kasyaitan nāma /
T02vimkn_u:683: Vkn .3.55 bodhimaṇḍa iti kulaputra āśayamaṇḍa eṣo 'kṛtrimatayā,
T02vimkn_u:684: prayogamaṇḍa eṣa ārambhottāraṇatayā, adhyāśayamaṇḍa eṣa viśeṣādhigamatayā,
T02vimkn_u:686: Vkn .3.56 dānamaṇḍa eṣa vipākāpratikāṅkṣaṇatayā, śīlamaṇḍa eṣa praṇidhānaparipūraṇatayā, kṣāntimaṇḍa eṣa sarvasatvāpratihatacittatayā,
T02vimkn_u:689: Vkn .3.57 maitrīmaṇḍa eṣa sarvasatvasamacittatayā, karuṇāmaṇḍa eṣa khedasahiṣṇutayā, muditāmaṇḍa eṣa dharmārāmaratiratatayā, upekṣāmaṇḍa eṣo 'nunayapratighaprahāṇatayā,
T02vimkn_u:690: Vkn .3.58 abhijñāmaṇḍa eṣa ṣaḍabhijñatayā, vimokṣamaṇḍa eṣo 'kalpanatayā,
T02vimkn_u:691: upāyamaṇḍa eṣa satvaparipācanatayā, saṃgrahavastumaṇḍa eṣa sarvasatvasaṃgrahanatayā, śrutamaṇḍa eṣa pratipattisārakatvāt,
T02vimkn_u:692: nidhyaptimaṇḍa eṣa yoniśaḥpratyavekṣaṇatayā, bodhipakṣyadharmamaṇḍa eṣa saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtotsarjanatayā, satyamaṇḍa eṣa sarvalokāvisaṃvādanatayā,
T02vimkn_u:695: Vkn .3.59 sarvasatvamaṇḍa eṣa satvāsvabhāvatayā, sarvadharmamaṇḍa eṣa śūnyatābhisaṃbodhanatayā, sarvamāranirghātanamaṇḍa eso 'calanatayā,
T02vimkn_u:696: traidhātukamaṇḍa eṣa prasthānavigamanatayā, siṃhanādanadanavīryamaṇḍa eṣo 'bhītānutrāsanatayā, balavaiśāradyāveṇikasarvabuddhadharmamaṇḍa esa sarvato 'nupākruṣṭatvāt, traividyavidyāmaṇḍa esa niravaśeṣatvāt kleśānām,
T02vimkn_u:698: Vkn .3.60 iti hi kulaputra yāvanto bodhisatvāḥ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ
T02vimkn_u:699: satvaparipākapratisaṃyuktaṃ saddharmaparigrahapratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalamūlapratisaṃyuktaṃ kramam utkṣipanti nikṣipanti ca /
T02vimkn_u:700: sarve te bodhimaṇḍād āgacchanti, buddhadharmebhya āgacchanti, buddhadharmeṣu ca pratiṣṭhante
T02vimkn_u:701: Vkn .3.61 iha bhagavan nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne pañcamātrair devamanuṣyaśatair
T02vimkn_u:704: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:705: Vkn .3.62 tatra bhagavān jagatindharaṃ bodhisatvam āmantrayate sma: gaccha tvaṃ jagatindhara vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:706: jagatindharo 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum
T02vimkn_u:710: atha māraḥ pāpīyān dvādaśabhir apsaraḥsahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ śakraveṣeṇa tūryasaṃgītisaṃpravāditena yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya mama pādau śirasā vanditvā saparivāro māṃ puraskṛtyaikānte 'sthāt tam enam ahaṃ jānāmi ḥ śakra eṣa devendra iti /
T02vimkn_u:711: tam aham etad avocam: svāgataṃ te kauśika, apramattena te bhavitavyaṃ
T02vimkn_u:714: sa mām evam āha: pratīccha tvaṃ satpuruṣa imāni dvādaśāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi mamāntikāt, etās te paricārikā bhavantām /
T02vimkn_u:715: tam aham etad avocam: mā tvaṃ kauṣika akalpikena vastunā śramaṇān
T02vimkn_u:716: śākyaputrīyān nimantraya, yathā na hy etā asmākaṃ kalpyanta iti /
T02vimkn_u:717: Vkn .3.63 eṣā ca kathā pravṛttā, vimalakīrtir licchavir upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:718: sa mām evam āha: mā atra kulaputra śakrasaṃjñām utpādaya /
T02vimkn_u:719: māra eṣa pāpīyāṃs tava viheṭhanābhiprāya upasaṃkrāntaḥ, naiṣa śakra iti /
T02vimkn_u:720: atha vimalakīrtir licchavis taṃ māraṃ pāpīyāṃsam etad avocat: asmabhyaṃ pāpīyan etā apsaraso niryātaya /
T02vimkn_u:721: asmākam etāḥ kalpyante, na śramaṇānāṃ śākyaputrīyāṇām iti /
T02vimkn_u:722: atha māraḥ pāpīyān bhītas trastaḥ saṃvignaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:723: mā vimalakīrtinā licchavinā vipralapsya iti, icchati cāntardhātum, na ca śaknoti sarvarddhim api darśayitvāntardhātum /
T02vimkn_u:724: so 'ntarīkṣāc chabdam aśrauṣīt: niryātaya tvam etāḥ
T02vimkn_u:725: pāpīyan apsarasa etasmai satpuruṣāya, tataḥ śakṣyasi svabhavanaṃ gantum /
T02vimkn_u:726: atha māro bhītas trasto 'kāmako 'smai tā apsaraso niryātayati /
T02vimkn_u:727: Vkn .3.64 pratigṛhya ca vimalakīrtis tā apsarasa etad avocat: niryātitā yūyaṃ mahyaṃ māreṇa pāpīyasā, utpādayatedānīm anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T02vimkn_u:729: sa tāsāṃ tadānulomikīṃ bodhiparipācanīṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā bodhau cittam utpādayati sma /
T02vimkn_u:730: sa tā evam āha: utpāditam idānīṃ yuṣmābhir bodhicittam,
T02vimkn_u:731: dharmārāmaratiratābhir idānīṃ yuṣmābhir bhavitavyam, na kāmaratiratābhiḥ /
T02vimkn_u:733: sa āha: buddhe 'bhedyaprasādaratiḥ, dharme śuśrūṣaṇaratiḥ, saṃgha
T02vimkn_u:749: Vkn .3.65 atha māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tā apsarasa etad avocat: āgacchata /
T02vimkn_u:751: tā evam āhuḥ: niryātitā idānīṃ tvayā vayam asmai gṛhapataye /
T02vimkn_u:752: dharmārāmaratiratābhir asmābhir idānīṃ bhavitavyam, na kāmaratiratābhiḥ /
T02vimkn_u:753: atha māraḥ pāpīyān vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim evam āha: niḥsṛja tvaṃ gṛhapate
T02vimkn_u:759: atha tā apsaraso vimalakīrtiṃ namaskṛtyaivam āhuḥ: kathaṃ vayaṃ gṛhapate
T02vimkn_u:761: Vkn .3.66 āha: asti bhaginyaḥ akṣayapradīpaṃ nāma dharmamukham /
T02vimkn_u:764: tadyathā bhaginyaḥ ekasmāt tailapradīpād dīpaśatasahasrāṇy ādīpyante /
T02vimkn_u:765: na ca tasya dīpasya parihāṇir bhavati /
T02vimkn_u:766: evam eva bhaginyaḥ eko bodhisatvo bahūni satvaśatasahasrāṇi bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati /
T02vimkn_u:767: na ca tasya bodhisatvasya cittasmṛtir hīyate, na
T02vimkn_u:769: evaṃ sarvān kuśalān dharmān yathā yathā pareṣām ārocayati deśayati, tathā tathā vivardhate sarvaiḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ /
T02vimkn_u:771: tatra yuṣmābhir mārabhavane sthitābhir aparimāṇānāṃ devaputrāṇām apsarasāṃ ca bodhicittaṃ rocayitavyam /
T02vimkn_u:774: Vkn .3.67 atha tā apsaraso vimalakīrter licchaveḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā sārdhaṃ māreṇa prakrāntāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:777: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:778: Vkn .3.68 tatra bhagavān sudattaṃ śreṣṭhiputram āmantrayate sma: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:779: sudatto 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:785: tatra saptame divase vimalakīrtir licchavis tāṃ mahāyajñaśālāṃ praviśya mām etad avocat: na śreṣṭhiputra evaṃ yajño yaṣṭavyo yathā tvaṃ yajase /
T02vimkn_u:788: tam aham etad avocam: kathaṃ punar dharmayajño yaṣṭavyaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:790: Vkn .3.69 yena dharmayajñenāpūrvācaramaṃ sarvasatvāḥ paripācyante, ayaṃ dharmayajñaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:804: Vkn .3.72 saddharmaparigrahābhinirhṛto balaparākramaḥ, saṃgrahavastv abhinirhṛtaṃ jīvitendriyam, sarvasatvānāṃ dāsatvaśiṣyatvābhinirhṛtā nirmānatā, asārāt sārādānābhinirhṛtaḥ kāyajīvitabhogapratilambhaḥ,
T02vimkn_u:818: ayaṃ sa kulaputra dharmayajñaḥ, yatra dharmayajñe pratiṣṭhitā bodhisatvā iṣṭayajñayājūkā dakṣiṇīyā bhavanti sadevakasya lokasya /
T02vimkn_u:819: evaṃ hi bhagavan tasya gṛhapater nirdiśatas tasyā brāhmaṇaparṣado dvayor brāhmaṇaśatayor anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni /
T02vimkn_u:820: Vkn .3.75 ahaṃ cāścaryaprasādapratilabdhas tasya satpuruṣasya caraṇau praṇamya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ kaṇṭhād avatārya dadāmi /
T02vimkn_u:821: sa taiḥ muktāhāraṃ na pratigṛhṇāti sma /
T02vimkn_u:823: yatra te prasādo bhavati tasmai prayaccheti /
T02vimkn_u:825: eko bhāgo yas tatra yajñaśālāyāṃ sarvalokajugupsito nagaradaridras tasmai dattaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:826: dvitīyaś ca bhāgo duṣprasahāya tathāgatāya dattaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:827: yathā ca sarvā parṣat paśyati taṃ ca marīciṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ ca duṣprasahaṃ tathāgataṃ taṃ ca muktāhāraṃ duṣprasahasya mūrdhasaṃdhau muktāhārakūṭāgāraṃ prādurbhūtaṃ citraṃ darśanīyaṃ caturasraṃ catuḥsthūṇaṃ samaṃbhāgaśaḥ suvibhaktam /
T02vimkn_u:828: Vkn .3.76 sa idaṃ prātihāryaṃ saṃdarśyemāṃ vācam abhāṣata: yasya dāyakasya dānapater yādṛśī tathāgate dakṣiṇīyasaṃjñā tādṛśī nagaradaridre
T02vimkn_u:831: Vkn .3.77 tatrāsau nagaradaridra idaṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā, imaṃ ca dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvā, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayati sma /
T02vimkn_u:832: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
T02vimkn_u:833: Vkn .3.78 iti hi sarve te bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ svakasvakān nirdeśān nirdiśanti sma, ye caiṣāṃ tena satpuruṣeṇa sārdham antarākathāsamudāhārā
T02vimkn_u:836: Vkn .4.1 tatra bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate sma: gaccha tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:837: mañjuśrīr apy āha: kiṃ cāpi durāsado 'sau bhagavan vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ,
T02vimkn_u:847: atha ca punar gamiṣyāmi buddhādhiṣṭhānena, tatra yathāśakti yathābalaṃ
T02vimkn_u:849: Vkn .4.2 atha tataḥ parṣadas teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ teṣāṃ
T02vimkn_u:850: ca śakrabrahmalokapālānāṃ teṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhavat: niścayena tatra mahādharmaśravaṇasāṃkathyaṃ bhaviṣyati, yatra mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ
T02vimkn_u:852: tatrāṣṭau ca bodhisatvasahasrāṇi pañcamātrāṇi ca śrāvakaśatāni saṃbahulāś ca śakrabrahmalokapālāḥ saṃbahulāni ca devaputraśatasahasrāṇi mañjuśriyam anubaddhāni dharmaśravaṇāya /
T02vimkn_u:853: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtas tair bodhisatvair mahāsatvais taiś ca śrāvakais taiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālair devaputraiś ca parivṛto vaiśālīṃ mahānagarīṃ praviśati sma /
T02vimkn_u:854: Vkn .4.3 atha vimalakīrter etad abhavat: ayaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta
T02vimkn_u:856: yan nv ahaṃ śūnyaṃ gṛham adhitiṣṭheyam /
T02vimkn_u:857: tena taṃ gṛhaṃ śūnyam adhiṣṭhitam apagatadvārapālam /
T02vimkn_u:858: na tatra mañcā vā pīṭhā vāsanāni vā saṃdṛśyante 'nyatraikasmān mañcāt, yatrātmanā glānaḥ samārūḍhaḥ śayitaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:859: Vkn .4.4 atha mañjuśrīḥ saparivāro yena vimalakīrter niveśanaṃ
T02vimkn_u:862: sa taṃ gṛhaṃ śūnyam apaśyad vigatadvārapālam /
T02vimkn_u:863: na cātra mañcān vā pīṭhān vāpaśyad anyatraikamañcāt,
T02vimkn_u:865: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam adrākṣīt /
T02vimkn_u:866: dṛṣṭvā ca punar evam āha: svāgataṃ mañjuśriyo 'svāgataṃ mañjuśriyo 'nāgatasyādṛṣṭaśrutapūrvasya darśanam /
T02vimkn_u:867: mañjuśrir āha: evam etad gṛhapate yathā vadasi /
T02vimkn_u:868: ya āgato na sa bhūya āgamiṣyati /
T02vimkn_u:869: yaś ca gato na sa bhūyo gamiṣyati /
T02vimkn_u:871: na cāgatasyāgamanaṃ prajñāyate, na ca gatasya gamanam, yaś ca dṛṣṭo na bhūyo draṣṭavyaḥ
T02vimkn_u:872: Vkn .4.5 api tu kaccit te satpuruṣa kṣapaṇīyam, kaccid yāpanīyam, kaccid vātena pratikupyanti dhātavaḥ, kaccid apagacchati vyādhir na vivardhate /
T02vimkn_u:873: bhagavāṃs te 'lpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchati, alpātaṅkatāṃ cālpaglānyatāṃ ca
T02vimkn_u:874: laghūtthānatāṃ ca yatrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
T02vimkn_u:875: Vkn .4.6 kutra te gṛhapate idaṃ vyādhisamutthānam /
T02vimkn_u:878: vimalakirtir āha: yāvacciram upādāya mañjuśrīḥ avidyā bhavatṛṣṇā ca
T02vimkn_u:880: yadā ca sarvasatvā vigatavyādhayo bhaviṣyanti tadā mama vyādhiḥ praśrabdho bhaviṣyati /
T02vimkn_u:884: yadā sarvasatvā vigatavyādhayo bhaviṣyanti tadā bodhisatvo 'rogo
T02vimkn_u:886: Vkn .4.7 tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ śreṣṭhina ekaputrako glāno bhavet /
T02vimkn_u:888: tāvac ca duḥkhitau bhavetāṃ yāvan nāsāv ekaputrakas tayor vigatavyādhiḥ syāt /
T02vimkn_u:890: sa satvaglānyena glāno bhavati, satvārogyāt tv arogaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:891: yat punar mañjuśriḥ evaṃ vadasi ḥ kutaḥ samutthito vyādhir
T02vimkn_u:893: Vkn .4.8 mañjuśrīr āha: śūnyaṃ te gṛhapate gṛham /
T02vimkn_u:901: āha: yenāpi parikalpyeta tad api śūnyam /
T02vimkn_u:904: āha: śūnyatā mañjuśrīḥ dvāṣaṣṭibhyo dṛṣṭigatebhyo mārgitavyā /
T02vimkn_u:905: āha: dvāṣaṣṭiḥ punar dṛṣṭigatāni kuto mārgitavyāni /
T02vimkn_u:909: yat punar mañjuśrīḥ evaṃ vadasi ḥ kas ta upasthāyaka iti /
T02vimkn_u:917: Vkn .4.9 mañjuśrīr āha: kidṛśo 'yaṃ te gṛhapate vyādhiḥ /
T02vimkn_u:919: āha: kim eṣa vyādhiḥ kāyasaṃprayukta uta cittasaṃprayuktaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:923: katame catvāraḥ, yad uta pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur iti /
T02vimkn_u:925: āha: ya evaṃ dhātuko mañjuśrīḥ sarvasatvānāṃ vyādhis tenāhaṃ vyādhitaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:926: Vkn .4.10 api tu khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ kathaṃ bodhisatvena glānako bodhisatvaḥ pratisaṃmoditavyaḥ
T02vimkn_u:927: mañjuśrīr āha: kāyānityatayā na ca nirvidvirāgatayā, kāyaduḥkhatayā na ca
T02vimkn_u:928: nirvāṇābhinandanatayā, kāyānātmatayā satvaparipācanatayā ca, kāyaśāntatayā na cātyantaśamatayā, sarvaduścaritadeśanatayā na ca saṃkrāntitaḥ,
T02vimkn_u:931: ādiviśuddhatayā, aparitarṣaṇatayā, sadāvīryāraṃbhāc ca, vaidyarājo bhaviṣyasi sarvavyādhīnāṃ śamayiteti /
T02vimkn_u:933: Vkn .4.11 mañjuśrīr āha: kathaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvena glānena svacittaṃ nidhyapayitavyam
T02vimkn_u:934: vimalakīrtir āha: iha mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatvena glānenaivaṃ svacittaṃ nidhyapayitavyam /
T02vimkn_u:937: na punar atra kaścit paramārthato dharma upalabhyate yasyaiṣa vyādhiḥ /
T02vimkn_u:940: na caiṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ kaścit svāmī na samutthāpayitā /
T02vimkn_u:949: te ca dharmāḥ parasparaṃ na cetayanti na jānanti /
T02vimkn_u:950: na ca teṣām utpadyamānānām evaṃ bhavaty utpadyāmaha iti /
T02vimkn_u:951: na nirudhyamānānām evaṃ bhavati nirudhyāmaha iti /
T02vimkn_u:952: Vkn .4.12 tena dharmasaṃjñāyā evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam /
T02vimkn_u:957: / tatra katamad vyādhiprahāṇam, yad idam ahaṃkāramamakāraprahāṇam /
T02vimkn_u:958: tac ca katamad ahaṃkāramamakāraprahāṇam, yad idaṃ dvayavigamaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:959: tatra katamo dvayavigamaḥ, yad idam adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā ca samudācāraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:960: tatra katamo 'dhyātmaṃ bahirdhā samudācāraḥ, yad uta samatayācalanatāpracalanatā /
T02vimkn_u:964: ubhe 'py ete śūnye, yad utātmā nirvāṇaṃ ca /
T02vimkn_u:967: ubhāv apy etāv apariniṣpannau, yad utātmā nirvāṇaṃ
T02vimkn_u:969: tena samadarśinā nānyo vyādhir nānyā śūnyatā kartavyā /
T02vimkn_u:971: Vkn .4.13 aviditā ca sā vedanā veditavyā /
T02vimkn_u:974: na ca durgatyupapannānāṃ satvānām antike mahākaruṇā notpādayitavyā /
T02vimkn_u:975: tathā kariṣyāmo yathaiṣāṃ satvānām evam ayoniśonidhyaptyā vyādhim apaneṣyāmaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:976: Vkn .4.14 na caiṣāṃ kaṃcid dharmam upaneṣyāmo nāpaneṣyāmaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:977: yato nidānāc ca punar vyādhir utpadyate tasya parijñāyai tebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:978: katamac ca punar nidānam, yad idam adhyālambananidānam /
T02vimkn_u:982: tasyādhyālambanatayā kā parijñā, yad idam ālambanānupalambhaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:984: kiṃ ca nopalabhate, ubhe dṛṣṭī nopalabhate, yad idam ātmadṛṣṭiṃ
T02vimkn_u:987: evaṃ hi mañjuśrīḥ glānena bodhisatvena svacittaṃ nidhyapayitavyaṃ jarāvyādhimaraṇopapattiprahāṇāya
T02vimkn_u:988: evaṃ ca mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatvānāṃ bodhir yadi na bhavet, nirarthako nanu vyāyāmo bhavet /
T02vimkn_u:989: yathā pratyarthikanirghātāc churā ity ucyante, evam eva jarāvyādhimaraṇaduḥkhopaśamanād bodhisatvā ity ucyante /
T02vimkn_u:991: yathā mama vyādhir abhūto 'sann evaṃ sarvasatvānām api vyādhir abhūto 'sann iti /
T02vimkn_u:995: anuśaṃsadṛṣṭipatitayaiva hi mahākaruṇayā bodhisatvasya khedo bhavaty upapattiṣu /
T02vimkn_u:996: anuśaṃsadṛṣṭiparyutthānavigatayā punar mahākaruṇayā bodhisatvasya khedo na bhavaty upapattiṣu
T02vimkn_u:999: so 'paryutthitacitta upapadyamāno mukta evotpadyate mukta eva jāyate /
T02vimkn_u:1000: sa mukta evotpadyamāno mukta eva jāyamāno baddhānāṃ satvānāṃ śaktaḥ pratibalo bandhamokṣāya dharmaṃ deśayitum /
T02vimkn_u:1001: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā sa tāvad ātmanā baddhaḥ paraṃ bandhanān mocayiṣyatīti nādaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate
T02vimkn_u:1002: yas tv ātmanā muktaḥ paraṃ bandhanān mocayiṣyatīti sthānam etad vidyate tasmān muktena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam, na baddhena /
T02vimkn_u:1003: Vkn .4.16 tatra katamo bandhaḥ, katamo mokṣaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1004: anupāyād bhavagatiparigraho bodhisatvasya bandhaḥ, upāyād bhavagatigamanaṃ mokṣaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1005: anupāyād dhyānasamādhyāsvādanatā bodhisatvasya bandhaḥ, upāyena dhyānasamādhyāsvādanatā mokṣaḥ
T02vimkn_u:1010: Vkn .4.17 tatra katamo 'nupāyasaṃgṛhītā prajñā bandhaḥ, yad idaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitanidhyaptiḥ, na ca lakṣaṇānuvyañjanabuddhakṣetrālaṃkārasatvaparipācananidhyaptiḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1015: tatra katamaḥ prajñayāsaṃgṛhīta upāyo bandhaḥ, yad idaṃ sarvadṛṣṭikleśaparyutthānānuśayānunayapratighapratiṣṭhitasya sarvakuśalamūlārambho bodhau cāpariṇāmanā /
T02vimkn_u:1017: tatra katamaḥ prajñāsaṃgṛhīta upāyo mokṣaḥ, yad idaṃ sarvadṛṣṭikleśaparyutthānānuśayānunayapratighaprahīṇasya sarvakuśalamūlārambho bodhau pariṇāmitas tasya cāparāmarśaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1019: Vkn .4.18 tatra mañjuśrīḥ glānena bodhisatvenaivam ime dharmā
T02vimkn_u:1023: yat punaḥ kāyavyādhipariharaṇatayā na khidyate, na pratibadhnāti saṃsāram,
T02vimkn_u:1025: punar aparaṃ yat kāyasya vyādheś cittasya cānyonyaparāparatāṃ na nirnavatāniḥpurāṇatāṃ
T02vimkn_u:1027: yat punaḥ kāyasya vyādheś cittasya ca nātyantopaśamaṃ nirodham atyayati, ayam asyopāyaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1028: Vkn .4.19 evaṃ hi mañjuśriḥ glānena bodhisatvena cittaṃ nidhyapayitavyam /
T02vimkn_u:1029: na ca tena nidhyaptau vānidhyaptau vā sthātavyam /
T02vimkn_u:1031: yadi hy anidhyaptau tiṣṭhed bāladharma eṣaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1035: Vkn .4.20 yan na pṛthagjanagocaro nāryagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ
T02vimkn_u:1036: / yat saṃsāragocaraś ca na ca kleśagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1037: yan nirvāṇapratyavekṣaṇagocaraś ca na cātyantaparinirvāṇagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ
T02vimkn_u:1038: yac caturmārasaṃdarśanagocaraś ca sarvamāraviṣayātikrāntagocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ
T02vimkn_u:1039: yat sarvajñajñānaparyeṣṭigocaraś ca na cākāle jñānaprāptigocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ
T02vimkn_u:1040: yac catuḥsatyajñānagocaraś ca na cākāle satyaprativedhagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ
T02vimkn_u:1043: yad ajātipratyavekṣaṇagocaraś ca na ca niyāmāvakrāntigocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ
T02vimkn_u:1044: yat pratītyasamutpādagocaraś ca sarvadṛṣṭivigatagocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ
T02vimkn_u:1045: yat sarvasatvasaṃgaṇikāgocaraś ca na ca kleśānuśayagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1046: yad vivekagocaraś ca na ca kāyacittakṣayaniśrayagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1047: yat traidhātukagocaraś ca na ca dharmadhātusaṃbhedagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ
T02vimkn_u:1048: yac chūnyatāgocaraś ca sarvākāraguṇaparyeṣṭigocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1049: yad ānimittagocaraś ca satvapramocanārambaṇavitarkagocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ
T02vimkn_u:1050: yad apraṇihitagocaraś ca saṃcintyabhavagatisaṃdarśanagocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ
T02vimkn_u:1051: yad anabhisaṃskāragocaraś ca sarvakuśalamūlābhisaṃskārāpratiprasrabdhigocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1054: yat ṣaḍanusmṛtigocaraś ca na ca sarvāsravakṣayagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1055: yat saddharmapratiṣṭhānagocaraś ca na ca kumārgādhyālambanagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ
T02vimkn_u:1058: yac caturapramāṇagocaraś ca na ca brahmalokopapattisparśanagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1059: yad dhyānasamādhisamāpattigocaraś ca na ca samādhisamāpattivaśenopapattigocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1060: yat smṛtyupasthānagocaraś ca na ca kāyavedanācittadharmātyarthagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1061: yat samyakprahāṇagocaraś ca na ca kuśalākuśaladvayopalambhagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1062: yad ṛddhipādābhinirhāragocaraś cānābhogarddhipādavaśavartigocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ
T02vimkn_u:1063: yat pañcendriyagocaraś ca sarvasatvendriyaparāparajñānagocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ
T02vimkn_u:1066: yat saptabodhyaṅgapariniṣpattigocaraś ca buddhiprabhedajñānakauśalyagocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1067: yan mārgapratiṣṭhānagocaraś ca kumārgānadhyālambanagocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ
T02vimkn_u:1072: yac chrāvakapratyekabuddhākalpasaṃdarśanagocaraś ca buddhadharmātyajanagocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1073: yad atyantaviśuddhiprakṛtisamāpannasarvadharmānugamanagocaraś ca yathādhimuktisarvasatveryāpathasaṃdarśanagocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1074: yad atyantāsaṃvartavivartākāśasvabhāvasarvabuddhakṣetrapratyavekṣaṇagocaraś ca nānāvyūhānekavyūhabuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhasaṃdarśanagocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1075: yad dharmacakrapravartanamahāparinirvāṇasaṃdarśanagocaraś ca bodhisatvacaryātyajanagocaraś ca, ayam api bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1076: iha nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne ye mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena sārdham āgatā devaputrās tato 'ṣṭānāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T02vimkn_u:1079: Vkn .5.1 athāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitad abhavat: kutreme bodhisatvā niṣatsyanti, ime ca mahāśrāvakāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1081: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetovitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: kiṃ bhadantaśāriputro dharmārthika
T02vimkn_u:1084: Vkn .5.2 āha: tena hi bhadantaśāriputra yo dharmarthiko bhavati, nāsau svakāyārthiko bhavati
T02vimkn_u:1086: yo bhadantaśāriputra dharmārthiko bhavati, na sa rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānārthiko bhavati, na skandhadhātvāyatanārthikaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1087: yo dharmārthikaḥ, na sa kāmadhāturupadhātvārūpyadhātvarthiko bhavati, nāsau buddhābhiniveśārthiko bhavati, na dharmasaṃghābhiniveśārthikaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1088: Vkn .5.3 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra yo dharmārthikaḥ, nāsau duḥkhaparijñānārthiko na samudayaprahāṇārthiko na nirodhasākṣātkriyārthiko
T02vimkn_u:1092: tatra yaḥ prapañcayati ḥ duḥkhaṃ parijñāsyāmi samudayaṃ prahāsyāmi nirodhaṃ sākṣātkariṣyāmi mārgaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmīti, nasau
T02vimkn_u:1095: / tatra ya utpādavyaye caranti, na te dharmārthikā na vivekārthikāḥ,
T02vimkn_u:1098: tatra ye kvacid dharme rakṣante 'ntaśo nirvāṇe 'pi, na te dharmārthikāḥ, rajo'rthikās te /
T02vimkn_u:1103: ye kecid dharmaṃ gṛhṇanti vā muñcanti vā, na te dharmārthikāḥ, udgrahaniḥsargārthikās te /
T02vimkn_u:1108: yeṣāṃ nimittānusārivijñānam, na te dharmārthikāḥ, nimittārthikās te /
T02vimkn_u:1110: ye kecid dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃvasanti, na te dharmārthikāḥ, saṃvāsārthikās te /
T02vimkn_u:1113: ye dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣu caranti, na te dharmārthikāḥ, dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātārthikās te
T02vimkn_u:1116: saṃskṛtagocarāḥ, na te dharmārthikāḥ, saṃskṛtodgrahaṇārthikās te /
T02vimkn_u:1117: tasmād iha bhadantaśāriputra dharmārthikena te bhavitukāmena sarvadharmānarthikena bhavitavyam
T02vimkn_u:1118: iha dharmanirdeśe nirdiśyamāne pañcānāṃ devaputraśatānāṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddham /
T02vimkn_u:1119: Vkn .5.6 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate
T02vimkn_u:1120: sma: tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ daśasu dikṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetraśatasahasreṣu
T02vimkn_u:1122: tat katarasmin buddhakṣetre tvayā sarvaviśiṣṭāni sarvaguṇopetāni siṃhāsanāni dṛṣṭāni /
T02vimkn_u:1123: evam ukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat: asti kulaputra pūrve
T02vimkn_u:1124: digbhāge ṣaṭtriṃśadgaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya merudhvajā nāma lokadhātuḥ
T02vimkn_u:1131: merudhvajāyāṃ lokadhātau tasya bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sarvaviśiṣṭāni sarvagunopetāni siṃhāsanāni /
T02vimkn_u:1132: Vkn .5.7 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ
T02vimkn_u:1134: tādṛśaṃ carddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān, yat tato merudhvajālokadhātor
T02vimkn_u:1135: dvātriṃśatsiṃhāsanaśatasahasrāṇi tena bhagavatā merupradīparājena tathāgatena preṣitāni /
T02vimkn_u:1136: tāvad udviddhāni tāvad vistīrṇāni tāvad darśanīyāni yad apūrvāṇi tair bodhisatvais taiś ca mahāśrāvakais taiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālair devaputraiś ca /
T02vimkn_u:1137: tāny upary antarīkṣeṇāgatya vimalakirter licchaver niveśane pratyatiṣṭhan /
T02vimkn_u:1138: tac ca gṛhaṃ tāvad vistīrṇaṃ saṃdṛśyate, yatra tāni dvātriṃśatsiṃhāsanaśatasahasrāṇi
T02vimkn_u:1140: na ca vaiśālyā mahānagaryā āvaraṇaṃ kṛtam, na
T02vimkn_u:1142: sarve te tathaiva saṃdṛśyante yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt /
T02vimkn_u:1143: Vkn .5.8 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam etad avocat:
T02vimkn_u:1144: niṣida tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ siṃhāsane sārdham etair bodhisatvaiḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1145: tādṛśāṃś cātmabhāvān adhitiṣṭhata yat siṃhāsaneṣv anurūpāḥ syuḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1147: ātmabhāvam adhiṣṭhāya teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu nisīdanti sma /
T02vimkn_u:1148: ye cādikarmikā bodhisatvās te na śaknuvanti sma teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu niṣattum /
T02vimkn_u:1149: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma: niṣīda bhadantaśāriputra siṃhāsane /
T02vimkn_u:1150: āha: na śaknomi satpuruṣa niṣattum uccāni pragṛhitāni cemāni siṃhāsanāni /
T02vimkn_u:1151: āha: tena hi bhadantaśāriputra tasyaiva bhagavato merupradīparājasya
T02vimkn_u:1154: atha te mahāśrāvakās tasya bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya namaskāraṃ kurvanti sma
T02vimkn_u:1155: te tatra paścāt teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu nyaṣīdan /
T02vimkn_u:1156: Vkn .5.9 athāyuṣmāñ śāriputro vimalakirtiṃ licchavim evam āha: āścaryaṃ kulaputra yad ihaivaṃ parītte gṛha imānīyanti siṃhāsanasahasrāṇy evam
T02vimkn_u:1158: na ca vaiśālyā mahānagaryā āvaraṇaṃ kṛtam, na jambūdvīpasya, na grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīnām,
T02vimkn_u:1159: na cāturmahādvīpikasya kiṃcid āvaraṇam, na devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāṇām āvaraṇaṃ kṛtam /
T02vimkn_u:1160: tathaiva saṃdṛśyante yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt /
T02vimkn_u:1161: Vkn .5.10 vimalakīrtir āha: asti bhadantaśāriputra tathāgatānāṃ
T02vimkn_u:1162: bodhisatvānāṃ cācintyo nāma vimokṣaḥ, yatrācintyavimokṣe pratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sumeruṃ parvatarājaṃ tāvad uccaṃ tāvat pragṛhītaṃ tāvad udviddhaṃ tāvad vistīrṇaṃ sarṣapaphalakośe praveśayet /
T02vimkn_u:1166: na cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśato vā jānīran ḥ kasmin vayaṃ prakṣiptāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1167: anye ca satvā ṛddhivineyā jānīyuḥ paśyeyus taṃ sumeruṃ parvatarājaṃ sarśapaphalakośapraviṣṭam
T02vimkn_u:1168: ayaṃ bhadantaśāriputra bodhisatvānām acintyasya vimokṣasya viṣayapraveśaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1169: Vkn .5.11 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo yaś caturṣu mahāsamudreṣv apskandhas tam ekasmin romakūpe
T02vimkn_u:1171: na ca matsyakacchapaśiśumāramaṇḍūkānām anyeṣāṃ vaudakānāṃ prāṇināṃ pīḍā bhavet /
T02vimkn_u:1172: na ca nāgayakṣagandharvāsurāṇām evaṃ bhavet ḥ kasmin vayaṃ prakṣiptāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1174: na ca kaścit satvo vihiṃsito viheṭhito vā bhavet /
T02vimkn_u:1175: Vkn .5.12 imaṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ bhārgavacakram iva
T02vimkn_u:1176: parigṛhya dakṣiṇe pāṇāv avabhrāmya gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān lokadhātūn kṣipet
T02vimkn_u:1177: / na ca satvā jānīran ḥ kasmin vayaṃ nītāḥ, kuto vāgatā iti /
T02vimkn_u:1181: Vkn .5.13 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra santi satvā apramāṇasaṃsāravainayikāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1184: satvānāṃ vainayikavaśam upādāya saptarātraṃ kalpam atikrāntam ādarśayet /
T02vimkn_u:1185: saṃkṣiptasaṃsāravainayikānāṃ satvānāṃ vainayikavaśam upādāya kalpaṃ saptarātram atikrāntam ādarśayet /
T02vimkn_u:1186: tatrāpramāṇasaṃsāravineyāḥ satvāḥ saptarātraṃ kalpam atikrāntaṃ saṃjānīran I saṃkṣiptasaṃsāravineyāḥ satvāḥ kalpaṃ saptarātram atikrāntaṃ saṃjānīran /
T02vimkn_u:1187: Vkn .5.14 iti hy acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān ekasmin buddhakṣetre saṃdarśayati /
T02vimkn_u:1188: sarvasatvān api dakṣiṇe karatale pratiṣṭhāpya cittajāyikayarddhyā kramet /
T02vimkn_u:1191: yāvatyaś ca daśasu dikṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūjā vartante, tāḥ sarvā ekaromakūpa ādarśayet
T02vimkn_u:1192: yāvantaś ca daśasu dikṣu candrasūryās tārārūpāni
T02vimkn_u:1193: ca, tāny api sarvāṇy ekaromakūpa ādarśayet /
T02vimkn_u:1194: yāvatyaś ca daśasu dikṣu vātamaṇḍalyaḥ pravānti, tā api sarvā mukhadvāre praveśayet /
T02vimkn_u:1196: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre tṛṇavanaspatayo nameyuḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1197: Vkn .5.15 yāni ca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrāṇy uddahyante kalpoddāhena, tad api sarvam agniskandhaṃ svamukhe prakṣipet /
T02vimkn_u:1198: yac ca tena karma kartavyaṃ bhavet, tac ca kuryāt /
T02vimkn_u:1199: yac cāvastād gaṅgānadīvālikākoṭīsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣv atikramya buddhakṣetram, tad abhyutkṣipyordhaṃ
T02vimkn_u:1201: tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣaḥ sūcyagreṇa badarīpatram utkṣipet /
T02vimkn_u:1202: Vkn .5.16 evam acṃtyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvāni cakravartyādirūpāṇy adhitiṣṭhet
T02vimkn_u:1203: Vkn .5.17 yāvantaś ca daśasu dikṣu śabdāvabhāsāḥ śabdaprajñāptayaḥ, tāḥ sarvā hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭānāṃ satvānāṃ sarvabuddhaghoṣarutaracitāny adhitiṣṭhan, tataś ca rutaghoṣād anityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmaśabdarutāni niścārayet /
T02vimkn_u:1204: yāvadbhiś cākāranirdeśair daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti, tāṃs tato rutanirghoṣān niścārayet /
T02vimkn_u:1207: api tu kalpam ahaṃ bhadantaśāriputra kalpāvaśesaṃ vācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ viṣayānāṃ viṣayāvatāranirdeśaṃ nirdiśeyam, ato vottari /
T02vimkn_u:1208: Vkn .5.19 atha khalu sthaviro mahākāśyapa imaṃ bodhisatvānām
T02vimkn_u:1209: acintyavimokṣaṃ śrutvāścaryaprāptaḥ sthaviraṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
T02vimkn_u:1210: tadyathāpi nāma āyuṣmañ śāriputra jātyandhasya puruṣasya purastāt kaścid eva sarvarūpagatāny upadarśayet /
T02vimkn_u:1211: na ca tatra sa jātyandha ekarūpam api paśyet /
T02vimkn_u:1212: evam eva āyuṣmañ śāriputra ihācintyavimokṣe nirdiśyamāne sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā iha jātyandhā iva cakṣurvihīnā ekasminn apy acintyakāraṇe na pratyakṣāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1213: ko nāma vidvān imam acintyaṃ vimokṣaṃ śrutvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpādayet /
T02vimkn_u:1214: tat kiṃ nu bhūyaḥ kariṣyāmo 'tyantopahatendriyā dagdhavinaṣṭānīva bījāny abhājanībhūtā iha mahāyāne /
T02vimkn_u:1215: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvā rudadbhis trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur vijñāpayitavyaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:1216: sarvabodhisatvaiś ca pramuditair imam acintyavimokṣaṃ śrutvā mūrdhnā
T02vimkn_u:1219: imaṃ nirdeśaṃ nirdiśataḥ sthavirasya mahākāśyapasya dvātriṃśatā devaputrasahasrair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni /
T02vimkn_u:1220: Vkn .5.20 atha vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ sthaviraṃ mahākāśyapam evam āha:
T02vimkn_u:1221: yāvanto bhadantamahākāśyapa daśasu dikṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu mārā māratvaṃ kārayanti, sarve te yadbhūyasācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitā bodhisatvā upāyakauśalyena satvaparipācanāya māratvaṃ kārayanti /
T02vimkn_u:1222: yāvadbhir bhadantamahākāśyapa daśasu dikṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisatvā yācanakair yācyante hastapādān vā karṇanāsaṃ vā śoṇitaṃ snāyuṃ vāsthimajjānaṃ vā netrāṇi vottamāṅgāni śirāṃsi vāṅgapratyaṅgāni vā rājyarāṣṭrajanapadān vā bhāryāputraduhitṝr vā dāsadāsīr vā hayagajarathavāhanāni vā suvarṇamaṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravāḍamaṇiratnajātaṃ vānnapānāni rasān
T02vimkn_u:1223: vā, vastrāṇi cotpīḍya yācyante, sarve te yācanakā
T02vimkn_u:1226: ugratapaso hi bhadantamahākāśyapa bodhisatvās ta evaṃ darśayanti /
T02vimkn_u:1228: tadyathāpi nāma bhadantamahākāśyapa na śaktir asti khadyotakasya sūryamaṇḍalaprabhām abhibhavitum
T02vimkn_u:1229: evam eva bhadantamahākāśyapa na śaktir asti prākṛtasya janasya bodhisatvenānavakāśakṛtasyopasaṃkramituṃ yācituṃ vā /
T02vimkn_u:1230: tadyathā bhadantamahākāśyapa yo hastināgasya prahāro na sa śakyo gardabhena soḍhum /
T02vimkn_u:1231: evam eva bhadantamahākāśyapa na śakyam abodhisatvena bodhisatvasyotpīḍanaṃ soḍhum /
T02vimkn_u:1233: ayaṃ bhadantamahākāśyapa acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisatvānām upāyajñānabalapraveśaḥ acintyavimokṣasaṃdarśanaparivartaḥ pañcamaḥ //
