T02vimkn_u:2216: atha vimalakīrter licchaver etad abhavat: yan nv aham itaś cāsanān nottiṣṭheyam /
T02vimkn_u:2217: tāṃ cābhiratiṃ lokadhātum anekabodhisatvaśatasahasrāṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsurādhyuṣitāṃ sacakravāḍaparikhāṃ sanadītaḍāgotsasaraḥsamudraparikhāṃ sasumerugirikūṭaparvatāṃ sacandrasūryajyotiṣāṃ sadevanāgayakṣagandharvabhavanāṃ sabrahmabhavanapārisadyāṃ sagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭramanuṣyāṃ sastryāgārāṃ sabodhisatvasaśrāvakaparṣadam, akṣobhyasya tathāgatasya bodhivṛkṣam, akṣobhyaṃ ca tathāgataṃ sāgaropamāyāṃ mahāparṣadi niṣaṇṇaṃ
T02vimkn_u:2218: dharmaṃ deśayamānam, api tāni padmāni yāni daśasu dikṣu buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti satvānām, api tāni trīṇi ratnamayāni sopānāni yāni jambūdvīpam upādāya trayastriṃśadbhavanam abhyudgatāni yaiḥ sopānair devās trayastriṃśato jambūdvīpam avataranty akṣobhyaṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāyai paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya jāmbudvīpakāś ca manuṣyās trayastriṃśadbhavanam abhirohanti devāṃs trayastriṃśato darśanāya /
T02vimkn_u:2219: evam apramāṇaguṇasamuditāṃ tām abhiratiṃ lokadhātum apskandham upādāya yāvad akaniṣṭhabhavanaṃ bhārgavacakram iva paricchidya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā puṣpadāmam ivādāyemāṃ lokadhātuṃ praveśayeyam praveśya cāsyāḥ sarvasyāḥ parṣado darśayeyam /
T02vimkn_u:2220: Vkn .11.5 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samādhim
T02vimkn_u:2221: samāpannaḥ, tādṛśaṃ carddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān yas tam abhiratiṃ
T02vimkn_u:2222: lokadhatuṃ paricchidya dakṣiṇena pāninā gṛhītvemaṃ sahaṃ lokadhātuṃ praveśayati sma /
T02vimkn_u:2223: Vkn .11.6 tatra ye divyacakṣuṣo 'bhijñāpratilabdhāḥ śrāvakā bodhisatvā devamanuṣyāś ca, te mahāntam utkrośam utkrośanti sma: knyāmahe bhagavan kriyāmahe sugata /
T02vimkn_u:2225: tān bhagavān vinayanārtham evam āha: na mamātra vṛṣabhitā vimalakīrtinā bodhisatvena kriyamāṇānām
T02vimkn_u:2226: tatra ye punar anye devamanuṣyāḥ, te na jānanti na paśyanti ḥ kuto vayaṃ kriyāmaha iti
T02vimkn_u:2227: na hy abhiratyā lokadhātor imaṃ sahaṃ lokadhātuṃ praveśitāyā ūnatvaṃ na pūrṇatvam abhūt /
T02vimkn_u:2228: na cāsya lokadhātor utpīḍo na saṃbādhaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:2231: Vkn .11.7 atha bhagavāñ śākyamunis tāṃ sarvāṃ parṣadam āmantrayate sma:
T02vimkn_u:2232: paśyata mārṣāḥ abhiratiṃ lokadhātum akṣobhyaṃ ca tathāgatam etāṃś ca kṣetravyūhāñ śrāvakavyūhān bodhisatvavyūhāṃś ca /
T02vimkn_u:2234: āha: īdṛśaṃ mārsāḥ buddhakṣetraṃ parigrahītukāmena bodhisatvenākṣobhyasya tathāgatasya bodhisatvacaryāyām anuśikṣitavyam /
T02vimkn_u:2235: asmin punar abhiratilokadhātusaṃdarśanarddhiprātihārye 'kṣobhyasya ca tathāgatasya saṃdarśane 'smin sahe lokadhātau caturdaśānām ayutānāṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni /
T02vimkn_u:2236: sarvaiś cābhiratyāṃ lokadhātau praṇidhānam utpāditam upapattaye /
T02vimkn_u:2237: te sarve bhagavatā vyākṛtā abhiratyāṃ lokadhātāv upapattaye /
T02vimkn_u:2238: iti hi vimalakīrtir licchavir yāvān iha sahe lokadhātau satvaparipākaḥ kartavyas taṃ sarvaṃ kṛtvā punar eva tām abhiratiṃ lokadhātuṃ yathasthāne sthāpayamāsa /
T02vimkn_u:2239: Vkn .11.8 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma: dṛṣṭā te śāriputra abhiratir lokadhātuḥ sa cākṣobhyas tathagataḥ /
T02vimkn_u:2242: sarvasatvāś cedṛśyarddhyā samanvāgatā bhavantāṃ yādṛśyā vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ kulaputraḥ
T02vimkn_u:2244: ye vayam īdṛśān satpuruṣān labhāmahe darśanāya /
T02vimkn_u:2245: teṣam api satvānāṃ sulabdhā lābhā bhaviṣyanti, ya etarhi tathāgatasya tiṣṭhato vā parinirvṛtasya vemaṃ dharmaparyāyam antaśaḥ śroṣyanti /
T02vimkn_u:2246: kaḥ punar vādaḥ, ye śrutvādhimokṣyante pratyeṣyanty udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanty adhimokṣyanti pravartayiṣyanti parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti
T02vimkn_u:2248: Vkn .11.9 te dharmaratnanidhānaprāptā bhaviṣyanti, yeṣām ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hastagato bhaviṣyati
T02vimkn_u:2249: tathāgatasahāyās te bhaviṣyanti, ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ svādhyāsyante /
T02vimkn_u:2250: dharmasaṃrakṣakās te bhaviṣyanti, ya etaddharmādhimuktānām upasthānaparicaryāṃ kariṣyanti
T02vimkn_u:2251: gṛhagatas teṣāṃ tathāgato bhaviṣyati, ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sulikhitaṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyanti satkariṣyanti /
T02vimkn_u:2252: sarvapuṇyaparigṛhītās te bhaviṣyanti, ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyam anumodiṣyante /
T02vimkn_u:2253: mahādharmayajñaṃ te yajiṣyanti, ya ito dharmaparyāyād antaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthāṃ saṃvaram api parebhyo vistareṇa deśayiṣyanti /
T02vimkn_u:2254: tad eva teṣāṃ bhagavan vyākaraṇaṃ yeṣām iha dharmaparyāye kṣāntī rucir matiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭir adhimuktir muktiś ca bhaviṣyati // //
T02vimkn_u:2256: Vkn .12.1 atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat: bahuni me bhagavan tathāgatasyāntikān mañjuśriyaś ca kumārabhūtasyāntikād dharmaparyāyaśatasahasrāṇi śrutāni /
T02vimkn_u:2257: na ca me jātv evam acintyavimokṣavikurvitadharmanayapraveśaśrutapūrvo yādṛśa iha dharmaparyāye nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:2258: Vkn .12.2 niḥsaṃśayaṃ te satvā evaṃ dharmabhājanā bhaviṣyanti, ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti /
T02vimkn_u:2260: ye bhāvanāyogam anuyuktā bhaviṣyanti, pithitās teṣāṃ sarvāpāyāḥ, anāvṛtās teṣāṃ sarve sugatipathāḥ, dṛṣṭās te sarvabuddhaiḥ,
T02vimkn_u:2261: nihatās taiḥ sarvaparapravādinaḥ, parājitās taiḥ sarvamārāḥ, viśodhitās tair bodhimārgāḥ, pratiṣṭhitās te bodhimaṇḍe, tathāgatagatisamavasaraṇās te bhaviṣyanti /
T02vimkn_u:2262: Vkn .12.3 ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti, aham api bhagavan teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇām upasthānaparicaryāṃ kariṣyāmi sārdhaṃ sarvaparivāreṇa /
T02vimkn_u:2263: yatra ca grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣv ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ pracariṣyati deśayiṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati, tatrāhaṃ saparivāro dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkrāmiṣyāmi /
T02vimkn_u:2265: utpādayiṣyāmi, prasannānāṃ ca dhārmikiṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyāmi /
T02vimkn_u:2266: Vkn .12.4 evam ukte bhagavāñ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat: sādhu sādhu devānam indra, subhāṣitaṃ te 'numodate tathāgataḥ /
T02vimkn_u:2267: yā devānām indra atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhir iha dharmaparyāya uddiṣṭā /
T02vimkn_u:2268: tasmād iha devendra atītānāgatapratyutpannās tena kulaputreṇa va kuladuhitrā vā buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūjitā bhaviṣyanti, ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgrahīṣyaty antaśaḥ pustakalikhitam api kariṣyati
T02vimkn_u:2270: Vkn .12.5 yaś ca punar devendra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgatapūrṇaṃ tadyathāpi nāmekṣuvanaṃ vā naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vaivaṃ śālivanaṃ vā pratipūrṇaṃ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryān mānayet pūjayet tāṃs tathāgatān sarvapūjābhiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ, parinirvṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ
T02vimkn_u:2271: tathāgatānām ekaikasya tathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇa ekaghanasyāvikopitasya śarīrasya sarvaratnamayaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayec caturmahādvīpikalokadhātupramāṇaṃ yāvad brahmalokam uccaistvena yaṣṭicchatrapatākābhir udviddhopaśobhitam evaṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ pratyekaṃ stūpaṃ kārayet, sa ca tatra kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā pūjāṃ kuryāt
T02vimkn_u:2272: sarvapuṣpaiḥ sarvagandhaiḥ sarvadhvajapatākābhiḥ sarvatūryatāḍāvacarasaṃpravāditena pūjāṃ kuryāt, tat kiṃ manyase devānām indra api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tato nidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
T02vimkn_u:2273: āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata, nāsya puṇyaskandhasya śakyaḥ paryanto
T02vimkn_u:2275: Vkn .12.6 bhagavān āha: ārocayāmi te devānām indra, prativedaya /
T02vimkn_u:2276: ataḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt, ya imam acintyavimokṣanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed vācayet paryavāpnuyāt /
T02vimkn_u:2278: dharmanirjātā hi devendra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ, sā dharmeṇaiva śakyā pūjayitum, nāmiṣeṇa
T02vimkn_u:2279: tad anenāpi te devendra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam /
T02vimkn_u:2280: Vkn .12.7 bhūtapūrvaṃ devānām indra atīte 'dhvany asaṃkhyeye kalpe 'saṃkhyeyatare vipule 'pramāṇe 'cintye yad āsīt tena kālena tena samayena
T02vimkn_u:2281: bhaisajyarājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān mahāvyūhe lokadhātau viśodhane kalpe /
T02vimkn_u:2282: tasya khalu punar devānām indra bhaiṣajyarājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya viṃśatir antarakalpa āyuḥpramāṇam abhūt /
T02vimkn_u:2285: tena ca devānām indra kālena tena samayena ratnacchatro nāma rājābhūc cakravartī saptaratnasamanvāgataś caturdvīpeśvaraḥ /
T02vimkn_u:2286: paripūrṇaṃ cāsya putrasahasram abhūc chūrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
T02vimkn_u:2287: Vkn .12.8 tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājñā ratnacchatreṇa sa bhagavān bhaiṣajyarājas tathāgataḥ pañcāntarakalpān satkṛtaḥ saparivāraḥ sarvasukhopadhānena /
T02vimkn_u:2288: iti hi devānām indra teṣāṃ pañcānām antarakalpānām atyayena sa rājā ratnacchatras tat putrasahasram āmantrayate sma: yat khalu mārṣāḥ jānīta, kṛtā mayā tathāgatasya pūjā, yūyam idānīṃ tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kuruta /
T02vimkn_u:2289: iti hi devānām indra te rājakumārāḥ pitū rājño ratnacchatrasya ḥ sādhv iti pratiśrutya sarve sahitāḥ samagrā aparān pañcāntarakalpāṃs taṃ bhagavantaṃ bhaiṣajyarājaṃ tathāgataṃ satkurvanti sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ /
T02vimkn_u:2290: Vkn .12.9 tataś caiko rājakumāraḥ somacchatro nāma /
T02vimkn_u:2291: tasyaikākino rahogatasyaitad abhūt: asti tv asyāḥ pujāyā anyodāratā viśiṣṭatarā pūjeti
T02vimkn_u:2292: tasyāntarīkṣād devatā buddhādhiṣṭhānenaivam āha: dharmapūjā satpuruṣa sarvapūjābhyo viśiṣyate
T02vimkn_u:2293: sa evam āha: katamā punaḥ sā dharmapūjeti /
T02vimkn_u:2294: devatāha: etam eva tvaṃ satpuruṣa tathāgataṃ bhaiṣajyarājam upasaṃkramya paripṛccha ḥ katamā sā dharmapūjeti /
T02vimkn_u:2296: atha devānām indra sa somacchatro rājakumāro yena bhagavān bhaiṣajyarājas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmat /
T02vimkn_u:2297: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt /
T02vimkn_u:2298: ekāntasthitaś ca somacchatro rājakumāras taṃ bhagavantaṃ bhaiṣajyarājaṃ tathāgatam etad
T02vimkn_u:2301: Vkn .12.10 sa bhagavān āha: dharmapūjā kulaputra yā tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ gambhīrāṇāṃ gambhīrāvabhāsānāṃ sarvalokapratyanīkānāṃ duravagāhānāṃ durdṛśānāṃ duranubodhānāṃ sūkṣmāṇāṃ nipuṇānāṃ nirupalambhānām bodhisatvapiṭakāntargatānāṃ dhāraṇīsūtrāntarājamudrāmudritānām avivartacakrasūcakānām ṣaṭpāramitānirjātānāṃ saṃgṛhītagrahāṇāṃ bodhipakṣyadharmānugatānāṃ bodhyaṅgāhārāṇāṃ satvamahākaruṇāvatārāṇāṃ mahāmaitrīnirdeśānāṃ māradṛṣṭigatavigatānāṃ pratītyasamutpādanirdiṣṭānām Vkn .12.11 nirātmaniḥsatvanirjīvaniṣpudgalānāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārāṇāṃ bodhimaṇḍāhārakāṇāṃ
T02vimkn_u:2302: dharmacakrapravartakānāṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvasaṃstutapraśastānāṃ saddharmavaṃśānupaccherttṝṇāṃ dharmagañjasaṃdhārakānāṃ dharmāgrapūjāvatīrṇānāṃ sarvāryajanaparigṛhītānāṃ sarvabodhisatvacaryāpraśāsakānāṃ bhūtārthadharmapratisaṃcitāvatārāṇāṃ dharmoddānānityaduḥkhānātmaśāntanirjātānāṃ duḥśīlaujoghaṭṭakānāṃ sarvaparapravādikudṛṣṭyupalambhābhiniviṣṭatrāsakarāṇāṃ sarvabuddhapraśastānāṃ saṃsāravipakṣāṇāṃ nirvāṇasukhasaṃdarśakānām /
T02vimkn_u:2303: evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ yā deśanā saṃprakāśanā dhāraṇā pratyavekṣaṇā
T02vimkn_u:2305: Vkn .12.12 punar aparaṃ kulaputra dharmapūjā yā dhārmeṣu dharmanidhyaptiḥ,
T02vimkn_u:2308: avigrahaḥ, avivādaḥ, amamatvam, mamakāravigamaḥ, arthapratiśaraṇatā na vyañjanapratiśaraṇatā, jñanapratiśaraṇatā na vijñanapratiśaraṇatā,
T02vimkn_u:2312: evaṃ ca dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyasamutpādam avekṣyate, akṣayābhinirhāreṇa
T02vimkn_u:2315: Vkn .12.13 iti hi devānām indra sa somacchatro rājakumāras tasya bhagavato
T02vimkn_u:2316: bhaiṣajyarājasya tathāgatasyāntikād imāṃ dharmapūjāṃ śrutvānulomikīṃ dharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabhate sma /
T02vimkn_u:2317: yathāprāvṛtaiś ca vastrābharaṇais taṃ bhagavantaṃ chādayati, evaṃ vācam abhāṣat: ahaṃ bhagavan
T02vimkn_u:2321: tasya sa tathāgato 'dhyāśayaṃ viditvā vyākṛtavān paścime kāle saddharmanagarapālarakṣāyai
T02vimkn_u:2322: Vkn .12.14 sa khalu punar devānām indra somacchatro rājakumāras tasya tathāgatasya tiṣṭhata eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ sann ārabdhavīryo viharati sma kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tenārabdhavīryeṇa kuśaladharmapratiṣṭhitena na cirāt pañcābhijñā utpāditāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:2324: sa tasya bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasyābhijñādhāraṇībalena paripūrṇān daśāntarakalpāṃs tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyarājasya tathāgatasya pravṛttaṃ dharmacakram anuvartayati sma /
T02vimkn_u:2325: tena khalu punar devānām indra somacchatreṇa bhikṣuṇā saddharmaparigrahābhiyuktena daśakoṭīśatāni satvānām avaivartikāni kṛtāny abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, caturdaśa ca prāṇiniyutāni
T02vimkn_u:2326: śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikāni, apramāṇāś ca satvāḥ svargopagāḥ kṛtāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:2327: Vkn .12.15 syāt khalu punas te devānām indra anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena ratnacchatro nāma rājābhūc cakravartī, na khalu punas te devānām indra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T02vimkn_u:2329: ratnārciḥ sa tathāgatas tena kālena tena samayena ratnacchatro nāma rājābhūc cakravartī /
T02vimkn_u:2330: yat punas tad rājño ratnacchatrasya putrasahasram abhūt /
T02vimkn_u:2332: yad iha bhadrakalpe paripūrṇaṃ buddhasahasram utpatsyate yataś catvāra utpannāḥ śeṣā utpatsyante, krakucchandapramukhā yāvad rocaparyavasānāḥ, roco nāma tathāgataḥ paścimako bhaviṣyati /
T02vimkn_u:2333: syāt khalu punas te devānām indra evam anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena somacchatro nāma rājakumāro 'bhūd yena tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyarājasya tathāgatasya saddharmaḥ parigṛhīta iti /
T02vimkn_u:2334: na khalu punas ta evaṃ draṣṭavyam
T02vimkn_u:2336: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena somacchatro nāma rājakumāro 'bhūvam /
T02vimkn_u:2337: tad anenāpi te devendra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam /
T02vimkn_u:2338: yāvatyas tathāgatānāṃ pūjāḥ, dharmapūjā tāsām agryākhyāyate, jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā varā pravarā praṇītottarā niruttarākhyāyata iti /
T02vimkn_u:2339: tasmād iha devānām indra dharmapūjayā māṃ pūjayata, mā āmiṣapūjayā /
T02vimkn_u:2341: Vkn .12.16 tatra bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisatvam āmantrayate sma: imāṃ te 'haṃ maitreya asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīsamudānītām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
T02vimkn_u:2342: anuparīndāmi, yathema evaṃrūpā dharmaparyāyā yuṣmadadhiṣṭhānena parigraheṇa tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye jambūdvīpe vaistārikā bhaveyuḥ, nāntardhīyeran /
T02vimkn_u:2344: bhaviṣyanti maitreya anāgate 'dhvani kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca
T02vimkn_u:2346: te 'śravaṇād asya dharmaparyāyasya mā parihāsyanta iti /
T02vimkn_u:2347: imān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntāñ śrutvātīva prema ca prasādaṃ ca pratilapsyante,
T02vimkn_u:2349: teṣāṃ tvaṃ maitreya tathārūpāṇāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ cānurakṣāyā imān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntāṃs tasmin kāle vaistārikān kuryāḥ /
T02vimkn_u:2350: Vkn .12.17 dve ime maitreya bodhisatvānāṃ mudre /
T02vimkn_u:2356: ye punar imaṃ maitreya gambhīraṃ sūtrāntam arūpalepaṃ yamakavyatyastanihārapadapuṭaprabhedaṃ pravartayiṣyanti śrosyanty adhimokṣyante vedayiṣyanti, ime bodhisatvāś ciracaritabrahmacaryā
T02vimkn_u:2358: Vkn .12.18 tatra maitreya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām ādikarmikā bodhisatvā
T02vimkn_u:2360: na ca gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nidhyaptiṃ gacchanti /
T02vimkn_u:2364: uttari ca pratikṣipante: ya ete 'smābhiḥ pūrvaṃ na śrutapūrvāḥ kuta ime 'dhunāgatāḥ
T02vimkn_u:2365: / ye ca te kulaputrā gambhīradharmasūtrāntadhārakā gambhīradharmabhājanā
T02vimkn_u:2366: gambhīradharmadeśayitāraḥ, tān na sevante na bhajante na paryupāsante,
T02vimkn_u:2367: agauravāś ca teṣu bhavanti, antarāntarā ca teṣām avarṇam api niścārayanti
T02vimkn_u:2368: / ābhyāṃ maitreya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām ādikarmikā bodhisatvā ātmānaṃ kṣiṇvanti /
T02vimkn_u:2369: na ca gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nidhyaptiṃ gacchanti /
T02vimkn_u:2370: Vkn .12.19 dvābhyāṃ maitreya kāraṇābhyāṃ gambhīrādhimuktiko bodhisatva ātmānaṃ kṣiṇoti
T02vimkn_u:2373: tāṃś cādikarmikān aciracaritān bodhisatvān avamanyate paribhavati na grāhayati na vivecayati nānuśāsti /
T02vimkn_u:2374: tayaiva ca gambhīrādhimuktyā śikṣāyām agauravo bhavati /
T02vimkn_u:2377: ābhyāṃ maitreya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ gambhīrādhimuktiko bodhisatva ātmānaṃ kṣiṇoti /
T02vimkn_u:2378: na ca kṣipram anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate /
T02vimkn_u:2379: Vkn .12.20 evam ukte maitreyo bodhisatvo bhagavantam etad avocat: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvat subhāṣitaṃ bhagavataḥ /
T02vimkn_u:2380: vayaṃ bhagavan etāṃś ca doṣān vivarjayiṣyāmaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:2381: imāṃ ca tathāgatasyāsaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ parirakṣiṣyāmo dhārayiṣyāmaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:2382: teṣāṃ cānāgatānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ bhājanībhūtānām imān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntān hastagatān kariṣyāmaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:2383: smṛtiṃ caiṣām upasaṃhariṣyāmo yayā smṛtyemān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntān rocayiṣyanty udgrahīṣyanti paryavāpsyanti dhārayiṣyanti pravartayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa
T02vimkn_u:2385: teṣāṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan upastambhaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:2386: ye ca khalu punar bhagavan tasmin kāla imān evaṃrupān sūtrāntān rocayiṣyanti pravartayiṣyanti
T02vimkn_u:2387: veditavyam etad bhagavan maitreyasya bodhisatvasyādhiṣṭhānam iti /
T02vimkn_u:2388: atha bhagavān maitreyasya bodhisatvasya sādhukāram adāt: sādhu sādhu maitreya, subhāṣitā ta iyaṃ vāk /
T02vimkn_u:2390: Vkn .12.21 atha te bodhisatvā ekasvareṇa vācam abhāṣanta: vayam api bhagavan tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasyānyonyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhya āgatyemāṃ tathāgatabuddhabodhiṃ vaistārikīṃ kariṣyāmaḥ teṣāṃ ca kulaputrāṇām ārocayiṣyāmaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:2391: Vkn .12.22 atha catvāro mahārājāno bhagavantam etad avocan: yatra yatra bhagavan grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣv ima evaṃrūpā dharmaparyāyāḥ pracariṣyanti deśayiṣyanti prakāśayiṣyanti, tatra tatra vayaṃ bhagavan catvāro mahārājāḥ sabalāḥ savāhanāḥ saparivārā
T02vimkn_u:2393: tasya ca dharmabhāṇakasya samantato yojanaśataṃ rakṣāṃ saṃvidhāṣyāmaḥ, yathā tasya dharmabhāṇakasya na kaścid avatāraprekṣy avatāragaveṣy avatāraṃ lapsyate /
T02vimkn_u:2394: Vkn .12.23 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma: udgṛhāṇa tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāraya vācaya pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśaya /
T02vimkn_u:2395: āha: udgṛhīto me bhagavan ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ /
T02vimkn_u:2398: bhagavān āha: tasmāt tarhi tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
T02vimkn_u:2399: vimalakīrtinirdeśaṃ yamakapuṭavyatyastanihāram acintyadharmavimokṣaparivartam ity api dhārayemaṃ dharmaparyāyam // //
T02vimkn_u:2401: āttamanā vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśrīś ca kumārabhūta āyuṣmāṃś cānandas te ca mahāśrāvakāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti //
T02vimkn_u:2403: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
T02vimkn_u:2404: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
T02vimkn_u:2405: deyadharmo 'yaṃ pravaramahāyānayāyino bhikṣuśīladhvajasya yad atra puṇyaṃ tad bhavatv ācāryopādhyāyamātāpitṛpūrvaṃgamaṃ kṛtvā sakalasatvarāśer anuttarajñānaphalāvāptaya iti //
